In England Attaullah Esakhelvi married with a Pakistani ethnography British lady
He has one son with her
He got second marriage with Bazgha, she is famous manuscript actress and they have only daughter named Laraib and only son named Sanwal
He received honorable award from the Government of Pakistan and Life time achievement award from the queen of England
He entered in Guinness book of World record for the singer of most recorded albums
Attaullah Esakhelvi ka shumar un gine chune artists mein kiya jata hai, jin ki maqboliyat, mutarrif hone se le kar shohrat ke urooj tak pohanchne tak radio, TV ya film ke marhoon e minnat nahi hai
Agarcha aise artists mein Munni Begum aur Aziz Miyan qawaal ka naam bhi shamil hai
Lekin top of the list Attaullah Esakhelvi ka naam he samjha jata hai
Jin ki ibtedai zindagi aur urooj ki daastan qabil e rashk bhi hai, dilchasp bhi aur kar hawalon se qabil e taqleed bhi
In mein mauseeqi ka shauq paida hua to inho ne gungunana shuru kar diya
Jab school teachers ne in ki awaaz suni to Mukesh aur Rafi ke songs ki farmaiysh karne lage aur hausla afzaai karne ke sath sath yeh dars bhi dete rehte ke singing na chorna
Wohi un ki infaradiyat bana

Yahin qismat ki devi un par meharban hui aur ‚Äú Rehmat Gramophone House ‚Äù naami aik company ne un ke songs ki recording ki‚Ä¶ ‚Äú Udhar Zindagi Ka Janaza Uthega ‚Äù aur Saraiki geet ‚Äú Naki Jae Gal Tu Rus Naa Ae Dhola ‚Äù ( Choti si baat par naraz ho jate ho maahi ), jab market mein aae to jaise hulchul mach gai
Har taraf ataullah Niazi ki singing ka charcha hone laga
Lekin us daur ke mustand singers ne unhe be surr iqraar de kar mustarid kar diya
Radio aur TV jo maand parhte sitaron ki kafalat he nahi bal ke ubharte hue artists ke hausla afzaai ki riwayaat bhi rakhte hain
Lekin dosri taraf village, dehaat, qasbon, buses, wagons aur chae khano mein Attaullah Esakhelvi ki awaaz ka tota bol raha tha

Taweel musafat ke liye buses ka ticket lene wale pehle yeh istafsaar bhi karte ke Attaullah Esakhelvi ki cassette lagaoge ?Mianwali ke logon ne inhe bataya ke tumhare naam se Esakhel mein hotel khul gae hain
Jagah jagah tumhari taswirein lagi hain aur Mianwali mein sirf tumhari cassette he farokht hoti hai, to Attaullah Esakhelvi ne phir Esakhel jane ka qasd kiya
Phir yeh hua ke radio Pakistan ke farmaishi naghmon ke programs mein 90 % log Attaullah Esakhelvi ke songs ki farmaiysh karte

Radio hukkam par bhi is hawale se dabao dala jata ke wo apni nashriyat mein Attaullah Esakhelvi ko madaoo karen aur aakhirkar majboor ho kar Attaullah Esakhelvi se radio Pakistan aane ki darkhuwast karni parhi
70 ki dehaai ka yeh wo zamana tha jab Attaullah Esakhelvi aik cassette ki recording ka muaawza 1 lac rupees liya karte the
Tahum radio par songs ka muaawza inhe 60 rupey ka cheque mila, jo inho ne cash nahi karwaya aur aaj tak sambhal kar rakha hua hai
Sirf yehi nahi bal ke radio par recording se qabal inhe audition ( Awaaz Ki Qaulity ka Imtehaan ) kea mal se bhi guzarna parha
Phir aahista aahista un ki singing ne tabqa ishrafia ke drawing rooms, cars ke sound systems aur video libraries mein jagah bana li
Beron e mulk basne wale Pakistani jab Watan aate to doston aur aehbaab ki farmaiysh pori karne ke liye barhi tadaad mein in ke cassette tohfatan le kar jate
Is tarah Europe aur Mashriq Wastee mein bhi wo Pakistan ki aik manoos aur maqbool awaaz ban gae
1980 mein inho ne pehli martaba British ka tour kiya to wahan bhi dhoom macha di
Diyar e ghair mein basne wale in ke songs sunn kar apno ko yaad karte to in ki aankhon se aansoo rawaa‚Äôn ho jate
Naujawan ladke aur ladkiyan walihana raqs karte to gorey bhi be saakhti ke aalam mein in ka sath dete
England aamad o raft ka silsila shuru hua to aik Pakistani nasaad British ladki ko dil de bethe
Is tarah wo aaj tak sab ke Lala he hain
Yeh aezaaz ab tak Attaullah Esakhelvi ke paas he hai ke recording aur farokht hone wale cassettes mein sab se ziyada in ki singing ke he hote hain
Inho ne hukomat e Pakistan se tamgha e imtiaz hasil karne ke sath Malika British se life time achievement award bhi hasil kiya hai
1994 mein in ka naam sab se ziyada audio albums recorder karane wale singer ke hawale se Guinness Book of World record mein bhi darj tha
Torkham se Karachi tak truck drivers ka safar un ki awaaz ke sath hota hai

President Ayyab Khan, Mohtarma Fatima Jinnah, baaz dosri shakhsiyat ki tasaweer to beshumaar trucks ke aqbii hisson par bani nazar aati hain, Lekin Attaullah Esakhelvi mulk ke wo wahid artist hain jin se wabistegi ka izhaar buses aur trucks ke piche tasweer banwa kar bhi kiya jata hai
She played a fantastic role in the drama serial ‚Äú Aangan Terha ‚Äù with Shakeel Siddiqui and Saleem Nasir ( Late )
Bushra ansari received many more different prizes and awards in her life
She received an award of Pride of performance and Women life achievement award from Benazir Bhutto
She won the PTV award and Lux style award also
Bushra ansari performed interesting role in the film ‚ÄúAbhi To Main Jawan Hon‚Äù from Geo TV
Yeh beyk waqt actress, singer, host, comedian and drama nigaar ke taur par pehchani jati hain
Inka har andaaz munfarid aur har roop judagana hai
sanjeeda acting, comedy, parody, singing, hosting aur ab drama nigari
Inho ne har field mein apna loha manwaya hai
Jis se in ki do betiyan hain
Intehai masroof aur mashoor fankara hone ke bawajood inho ne aik biwi aur maa ka role pori zimmedari se adaa kiya
Bushra apni family se bohat ziyada attached hain aur fursat ka tamam waqt ghar walon ke sath he guzarti hain
Career : Bushra Ansari sirf 9 saal ki umer mein he PTV ke children music show, Kalbon ki Mala ki regular performer ban gai thin
To Farooq Qiaser ne inhe apne show Kalliyan ke liye muntakhib kiya
Is ke ilawa wo show ke deegar roles ke liye bhi songs gaya karti thin
Bunyadi taur par yeh bahon ka show tha, lekin ise har umar ke nazreen barhe shauq se dekha karte the
Bushra ne sab se pehle Iqbal Ansari ke aik drama mein acting ke johar dikhaey
Lekin Bushra ko sab se ziyada shohrat Anwar Maqsood ke show Shosha se mili
Jis mein bushra ne bijli ka role adaa kar ke meyla loot liya
Yeh character itna popular hua ke jab kabhi Bushra Ansari kisi show ke silsile mein beyron e mulk jati to in se bijli ka character karne ki farmaiysh ki jati
Bushra Ansari ka aik aur aeham show Aangan Terha hai, jise Anwar Maqsood ne likha aur us mein inho ne Shakeel Siddiqui aur Saleem Nasir Marhoom ke hamrah yadgar performance di
Comedy shows ki bat ho to sab se pehle PTV ki tareekh ke maqbool tareen show Fifty Fifty ka naam zehan mein aata hai

is show ko maqboliyat ki bulandiyon tak pohnchane mein Jahan Ismail Tara aur Majid Jahangir ki lajawab performance ka dakhal tha to Bushra Ansari ne bhi apni parodies ke zariye is show ko kamiyab banane mein koi kasar na chori
inho ne chehre ke tasurrat aur body language ke zariye in roles mein jaan daal di
Bushra Ansari ne har umer ke role adaa kiye hain, jin mein young, udherh aur old age sab he shamil hain
Personality : Bushra Ansari ko sirf acting mein he malka hasil nahi, bal key eh aik shandar shakhsiyat ki bhi malik hain
Yeh guzishta 40 saal se mini screen par apni salahiyaton ke johar dikha rahi hain aur din ba din in ke har sitaron ki tadad mein izafa hota ja raha hai
kyun ke wo janti hain ke waqt ke sath sath apne kaam mein kya tabdeeli lai ja sakti hai
dilchasp harkaat, dilkash personality aur khobsurat chehre ki malik Bushra Ansari har umar ke nazreen mein popular hain
Chand maah qabal inho ne Geo TV ke show Dolly ki Aaegi Baraat mein Saima Chaudhry ka role play kar ke is serial ko mazeed dilchasp bana diya

aur Pakistani tareekh per app nay itnay gehray asrat morattab keyeh kay inka ahatah karna kai jildon ka matqazi hay.
App kay walid Sir Shahnawaz Bhutto nay app ki taleem-o-tarbiat per khususi tawajah di.
Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto bohot achchay moqarir thay cricket bhi khaltay thay aur tulba ki siasat mein bhi hissa latay thay.
Garz har laihaz say aik mumtaz talib ilm thay.

October 1959 mein unhain U.N.O mein Pakistani wafad ka quaid bana ker bhaja gai to Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto nay Russia aur America ki taraf say takhfife aslaha ki tajaweez kay silsilay mein Pakistani moqif bohot khubsurti say pesh kiya
Iss daur mein woh Ayub Khan kay motamid tarin sathi samjhay jatay thay
. 1962 kay dastoor ko akhri shakal denay mein woh manzoor qadir kay dast rast thay.
1963 mein Sadar General Ayub Khan nay unhain Hilal Pakistan ka tamga dia jo Pakistan ka sab say bara  civil award hay.
.Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto ki khahis thi kay unhain wazir kharja moqarrar kiya jaye
Wazir-e- kharja ki hasiat say unhon nay Communist block kay sath khus gawar taluq kay qaim aur Chine kay sath dosti qaim kernay ki taraf peshraft ki
Jagirdarana pas manzar kay bawjood apni maa kay sath honay walay bartao kay natijay mein woh garibon aur pisay hua awam kay sath husn-e-salok ka jazba rakh tay thay.
Iss tarah Bhutto kay mijaz ki tashkil mein unkay jagidana mijaz kay sath sath garib perwari ka jazba bhi tha.
Aala taleem nay unhain ‚Äúliberal‚Äù bana dia tha.
Iss kay sath sath unhon nay  Socialism ka bagor motala kia tha iss tarah woh ikhtaiarat ko markazi shakhsiyat ya markazi adaron kay pass jama kernay ka rojhan bhi rakhtay thay.
Bhutto kay zehan mein apni siasi jaddo jahad kay khatoot bilkul wazah tha.
Is duniya mein bohat se log jaah o mansab ke peeche bhaagte dikhai dete hain, lekin Vladimir Putin ko dekh kar aisa maloom hota hai ke jaise aeham tareen auhdey khud in ka taqqub kar rahe hon.
Aik taraf to inhe marshal arts se na sirf qalbi lagao hai,bal ke wo judo ke mahir ( black belt, 6 dawn ) bhi hain.
Jab ke dosri janib inhe jarihana mizaaj ka hamil aur khatraat mool lene wala politics samjha jata hai.
Wo taleem ke maidan mein kisi se piche nahi rahe, inho ne qanoon mein graduation ke bad economics mein doctorate ki degree bhi hasil ki.
1994 mein wo senate Peters Burg ke deputy mayor ban gae.

Mukhtalif auhdon par faiz rehne ke bad August 1999 mein Russian president Boris Ulsan ne Putin ko prime minister bana diya aur usi saal 31 December ko Ulsan ne president se istefa dete hue inhe qaiym maqam president muqarrar kiya.
2004 mein inho ne dobara sadarti intekhab mein kamiyabi hasil ki.
Mubasireen ke mutabiq president Putin ke azam o iraade ki pukhtagi ne in ki kamiyabiyon mein behad aeham kirdar ada kiya gaya hai.
President Putin ko maghrabi zarae iblaagh ne nae Russia ka czar ka khitaab diya hai, guzre waqton mein Russia ke badshahon ko czar kaha jata tha.

Jawahar Laal Nehru ke siyasi turke ki maujoda waris Italvi nasaad Sonia Gandhi duniya ki sab se barhi jamhoriyat kehlane wale mulk Bharat ke sab se taqatwar aur purkashish auhdey yani wazarat e uzma ko thukrane wali ikloti politician hain.
1968 mein Rajiv Gandhi se shadi ke bad inho ne bharat mein rehaiysh ikhteyar kar li.

Ibteda mein Sonia ko bharti khane aur malbosaat zara pasand nahi aae aur aik dafa in ki mini skirt mein tasveer shaey ho jane par tanaza bhi uth khara hua tha, lekin jaisa Des waisa Bhes ke masdaaq inho ne Sonia Maino se Sonia Gandhi banne ke liye na sirf desi malbosaat aur khane apna liye, bal ke dekhte he dekhte zabardast hindi bhi bolne lagi.

In ka ghar bachon ke qehqahon se goonjta rehta hai.
Wo 42 baras ki umer mein bhi nihayat haseen dikhai deti hain.
Yahan tak ke in ki shohrat ghar ghar pohanch gai, bilkhusoos in ka yeh jumla zabaan zadd khaas o aam ho gaya

Pakistan Tehreek e Insaaf ke chairman Imran Khan ki wife ki hesiyat se wo har us maqsad ke liye in ke shana bashana dikhai deti hain ke jis ke liye wo jaddojehad kar rahe hain, misaal ke taur par aik naya Pakistan ke jahan har shakhs ko izzat ke sath jeene ka haq hasil hua.
Tahum is ke bawajood in ki Imran Khan ke sath sath maujodgi is baat ki ghumaz hai ke Reham Khan bhi Pakistan ko badalne ki tehreek mein apne kirdar ke hawale se pur azam hain.

Reham Khan ka sab se maussir hathiyar in ki 500 mega watt taqat wali dilnasheen muskurahat hai jo us waqt bhi in ke labon par machal rahi thi, jab inho ne apni zindagi, Imran Khan se shadi, kaam aur apne bachon ke barey mein hamare sath halki phulki guftugo ki shuruwat ki.
Nahi kabhi nahi.
Wo aise aadmi nahi ke aap ko kuch karne par majboor karen.
Imran, main aap se is liye shadi kar rahi hon ke log nahi jante ke aap kitne ache insaan hain, mera khayal hai ke logon ko andaza he nahi ke wok is tarah ke insaan hain.
Wo chalak hain na makkar, bilkul waise he hain ke jaise dikhai dete hain.
Wo logon ke sath khilwar nahi karte.
Main bhi in ke barey mein yehi tassur rakhti thi ke wo jarihana mizaaj rakhte hain aur ghusiley bhi hain, magar yeh haqiqat nahi.
Wo muaaf kar dene wale shakhs hain, agar koi shakhs bilkhusoos koi mulazim ghalti kar bethta hai to wo ise yaksar nazar andaaz kar dete hain.
Log inhe maghroor samajhte hain, lekin wo bohat aajzi aur inkesari wale insaan hain.

Jab Reham Khan se pocha gaya ke siyasat se qataa nazar Imran ko aur kya pasand hai to in ke kehna tha, ke jab main is ghar mein aai to mera tassur kuch is tarah ka tha ke ooo hooo, Imran ko to daal dalliya bhi thek tarah se nahi milta.
Agar main kitchen mein naya item banao to in ka radde amal kuch is tarah ka hota hai
Imran bohat qabil e tareef hain kyun ke wo kisi bhi tarah ke halaat mein reh sakte hain, wo bila wajah naak bhawen charane wale aadmi nahi hain.
Main ne Imran ko bata diya tha ke main koi samjhota karna nahi chahti.
Main apne bachon ko bohat azaadi deti haon, jo ke shayad bohat se deegar waldain nahi dete.
Mere bhi kuch usool hain lekin is tarah ke nahi ke shor na karo ya mauseeqi na suno.
Hamara bohat shor sharabe wala ghar hai aur bachon ke sath hamare talluqat bohat sidhe aur aasaan hai.
To Reham Khan ne kaha ke Imran bohat he ache baap hain.

Suleman he ko dekh lijiye, jo Imran aur Jamaima ka barha beta hai, wo is baras 19 saal ka ho jaega, lekin ab bhi wo apne baap ke sath chimat kar sota hai aur mera khayal hai ke waldain ke liye ladkon ke sath laad piyar karna bohat zarori hai, chahe wo kitne he barhe kyun na ho jae.
Mere bachon ko to mujhe ziyada laad piyar karne se rokna parhta hai kyun ke mein in ke ird gird he mandlati rehti hon, yahan tak ke inhe kehna parhta hai ke, Mum, 1 minute ke liye he thehar jae.
Step Father ki hesiyat se bhi Imran bohat ache hain.
Hamare masaiyl sirf hamare bachon se mutalliq the.
Hamare waise he tafarrukat hain ke jaise aam waldain ke hote hain.
Aap Imran se yeh tawaqqa nahi rakh sakte ke wo sab he choti chezon ke barey mein sochenge, lekin wo bohat naram dil aur hassas insaan hain.
Wo aise aadmi hain ke inho ne kabhi apni sabqa biwi ( Jamaima ) ko bura bhala nahi kaha, bal ke in ke sath bahmi aihteraam ka talluq barqarar rakha hai.
Main aksar apne beton se kehti hon ke tum in ki yani Imran ki tarah baat karte ho, in ke jaisa libaas pehante ho to in jaisa insaan banne ki bhi koshish karo.
In ke jaise shohar bano, in ke jaise sabiq shohar bano, in ke jaise bhai bano aur in ke jaise bete bano.
nae nae shadi shuda afraad ke liye sab se aeham tip yeh hai ke in ke dil mein bachon ki shadeed khuwahish honi chahiye.
Hamare han aam taur par shadi shuda afraad is liye Maa Baap banne ki khuwahishmand hote hain ke muaashra in se yehi tawaqqa kar raha hota hai.
Main samajhti honk e kuch log ache waldain banne ka rujhaan rakhte hain aur kuch log is se mehroom hote hain.
Lehaza sab se achi tip to yehi hai ke husool aulaad ke khuwahishmand hon aur bachon ki parwarish se lutf uthae.
Dosri aeham tip yeh hai ke aap ko apne bachon ke sath ziyada se ziyada waqt guzarna chahiye. Log hairan ho kar mujh se pochte hain ke main ne
Akeli Maa ke taur par kaise 3 bache paal liye, lekin haqiqat yeh hai ke in ki parwarish karna mere liye taza hawa ki manind farhat bakhsh tha.
Main ne hamesha prime time talk shows kiye aur Pakistan ke tamam he siyasatdano ke interview kiye.
Tumhari Urdu achi nahi hai, tum bohat naram mizaaj ki ho, yahan bohat chillana parhta hai, larhna parhta hai lekin mere khayal mein yeh logon ki zihanat ki tauheen hai.
Inhe aik mauqa milna chahiye ke wo khud is baat ka faisla kar saken ke kya behtar hai aur kya nahi.
Main ne kisi bhi lihaaz se khud ko tabdeel nahi kiya.

Apne sab se yaadgar interview ke barey mein inho ne bataya, mujhe badam zari bohat achi lagi, yeh wo pehli khatoon hai ke jis ne wafaq ke zair e intezam qabaili ilaqey ( Fata ) se pehli bar azaad hesiyat mein election larha.
Is khatoon ko dekha kar mera hausla barha aur is interview ko androne bairoon mulk bohat ziyada dekha gaya.
Pehli baat to yeh hai ke Imran khud ko politician nahi samajhte, is liye mera kaam aasaan ho gaya.
Wo samajhte hain ke wo aik mission par hain aur main bhi aisa he samajhti hon.
Haqiqat yeh hai ke main is hawale se koi dabao mehsoos nahi karti.
Log samajhte hain ke agar main kaam karna chahongi to Imran Khan mujhe mana karenge, halan ke haqiqat is ke bar aks hai, mujhe Imran ne kabhi aisa nahi kaha.
Yaqinan inho ne mujh se shadi is liye nahi ki hogi ke mujhe tabdeel karen.
Inho ne 62 baras mein shadi ka faisla karne se pehle yaqinan achi tarah ghaur o fikar kiya ho ga.
Yeh apni pasand se meri pehli shadi hai.
Main ne kuch dekhe bhale bagher he shadi ke liye in ki sherwani pasand karti thi.
Shadi wale din in ka bass nahi chal raha tha ke kisi tarah photosession jald az jald khatam karae aur khane ke liye beth jae.
Yeh aik bohat piyara din tha ke jo hum ne apni family aur bachon ke sath guzara.
Us din hamari family ke mehaz 8 afraad maujood the aur us news channel ki team bhi jis ke sath main 2007 se munsalik thi.
Ghar mein hum bilkul aik normal couple ki tarah rehte hain.
Main khana pakati hon, hum log khilwat mein rehna pasand karte hain aur bilkul gharelo andaaz ki zindagi guzaarte hain.
Jahan tak aik dosre ko waqt dene ka talluq hai to Imran is muaamle mein mujh se kahin behtar hain.
Shaam 7 baje ke bad wo mujhe bhi koi kaam nahi karne dete.
Reham Khan ne jawab diya, „ÉªJab mujhe street children ke hawale se safer muqarrar kiya gaya to is par bohat batein banai gai.

Main baazabta taur par tehreek e Insaaf ka hissa hon, na he NWFP hukomat ka, lekin main streer children aur child labor ke hawale se bohat mutafakkir rehti hon, is liye main in mauzoaat par kaam karti rahi hon.
Humen child labor ka khatma karna ho ga aur main aik tehreek ki soorat mein isi maqsad ke liye kaam kar rahi hon.
Main NWFP se achi tarah waqif hon, isi liye wahan se kaam ka aaghaz kiya, lekin is ka hargiz yeh matlab nahi ke main Sindh, Baluchistan aur Punjab mein kaam nahi karongi.
Agar main sab se pehle khud apne province ke barey mein sochti hon to yeh bilkul fitri baat hai.
Is liye man chahti hon ke duniya ko pakhtuno ka asal roop dikhao.
Jin mein se aik Pashtun poet aur Jungjo Khushhaal Khan Khatak ke barey mein hai, yeh film Pakhtun tareekh aur saqafat ki akkasi karegi, jab ke dosri film romantic comedy noiyat ki ho gi.

Main chahti hon ke jis area se qeemti pathar aur dhatein nikalti hain, wahan ke log in stones ki cutting, polishing, finishing, sales aur marketing jaise muaamlaat mein bhi maharat hasil karen, taa ke in ka meyaar e zindagi bulnad ho saken.
Hamare logon ki hunarmandi ka meyar bhi Thailand aur Dubai ki takkar ka hona chahiye.
Sab se pehle to khuwateen ko apne is khayal se picha churana chahiye, ke wo kisi bhi lihaaz se kamtar hain.
Main nahi samajhti ke main aik aura thon, main khud ko aik fard samajhti hon, aurat hona mere liye koi rukawat nahi.
Jahan tak Imran ka talluq hai to unho ne mujhe meri apni shakhsiyat ke sath qabool kiya hai.
Mujhe apni shakhsiyat ke niswani pehlon ke sath jeene ka pora haq hasil hai.
Agar aap ko piyar aur acha mahaul milta hai to aap ko kisi aur chez ki parwah nahi hoti.
Main ne Imran ko bataya tha ke jab mere walid jogging ke liye jaya karte the to wo har din meri waldah ke liye phool laate the.
Imran bhi har din subha ki walk ke bad mere liye phool late hain.
Mujhe jewelry ki koi zarorat nahi, kyun ke Imran ke liye hamare baagh se behtareen Rose muntakhib kar ke laate hain.
Main Imran se kehti hon ke aap ki hesiyat is se barh ke hai, aap ko to aisa hona chahiye ke aane wali naslein bhi yaad karen ke aisa bhi koi leader tha.
Is baat par Reham Khan ne muskurate hue kaha
K sab se achi baat yeh hai ke main Imran ki wife nahi, mera matlab hai ke jab main ghar mein hoti hon to Imran Khan ki biwi nahi hoti hon.
Matlab yeh ke main is hawale se khud par koi dabao nahi leti.
Mujhe Gucci ke coat pasand hain.
Kyun ke meri shadi aik bohat he sadah se insaan se hui hai.
Lekin phir bhi mujhe new shoes lena bohat acha lagta hai.
Jahan tak fitness ka talluq hai to meri shadi aik aise insaan se hui hai, jo junoon ki had tak apni fitness ka khayal rakhte hain.
Main hamesha se bohat dubli patli rahi hon, kyun ke mere 3 bache hain aur main aik lamhe ke liye bhi kahin par tikk ke nahi bethti hon.
Imran kafi tez daurte hain, lekin main bhi itni he tez daur sakti hon ke jitni tez Imran daurte hain.
Lekin main hamesha apne bachon kea as paas he daur lagati rehti hon.
Khuraak ke mauaamle mein Soshi meri pasandeeda dish hai, lekin mujhe pizza bhi bohat pasand hai.
Main bohat cooking karti hon aur new se new sweet dishes banane mein lagi rehti hon
Talib ilmi ke zamaney hi se insaf, insani haqooq, aman aur jamhuriyat ke hami aur fayal karkun rahey hain
Ansar Burney ki yeh falyat Marshal Law Hukam ko pasand na aie aur unhain 1977 mein 8 Mah qaid ba moshaqqat ki saza dea ker jail mein dal dea.

Iss tara Ansar Burney ko kai baras tek jailon ki surat hal aur qaidyon ki halat zar ka chasm deed moshaheda ker ney ka moqa mil gea unhon ney qaid khaney hi mein yeh faisla ker lea kay jab bhi rahai mili bea gunah aur mazloom quidyon ki najat key leyeh koi adara quaim kerein gein.

Ansar Burney Welfare Trust International
Chunanchey 1980 mein unhon ney Ansar Burney Welfare Trust International quaim kea pher iss key tehat zaily adaray quaim keay yani Parznrzaid Society jo key qaidyon ko qanuni imdad mohaiya ker ti hi.

Gumshoda aur agwa shoda ashkhas ki bazyabi key leye Beuro aur insedad dehsht gerdi key lea aik comition yeh trust aik gair serkari gair seasi aur gair munfiet andoz insani haqooq ki die tanzem hay aur is ski rejgtration Amrica mein bhi ho chuki hay inn ki mosalsal aur bea louse koshishon sey ab tek lakhon sey zaida aeyse quadi reha ho chukey hain jog air qanooni tour par Pakistan aur barony mumalik mein quaid rahey inn mein sey baz jailon mein hi paida huay they aur chalees chalees sal bea qasoor aur bea gunah sakht moshaqqat ki zindagi mahaz laquniat ki waja sey guzar rahey thay neaz bees hazar sey zaidah gumshudah aur agwa shudah bachchon aur bachion ko baziab karaya ja chukka hay halankey iss hawaley sey unhain khasi tanqeed ka nishana banna para.

Bharti jasus Kashmir Singh ki rahae ka mamla bhi aysa hi aik case tha Kashmir Singh ney Bharat mein jaker Pakistan mein apni ser germion key hawaley sey jo bianat dea un par Pakistani halqon mein gahra gam o ghussa dekhney mein aya taham Ansar Burney ney kaha key un ka zameer mutmaen hay Kashmir Singh ney bhi apni rahai key hawaley sey Ansar Burney key kirdar ko saraha.

Insani haqooq key leyeh Ansar Burney ki khidmat key aeteraf mein hukumat Pakistan ki taraf sey unhain sitara e imtaiaz sey nawaza gea aur kai bainul aqwami aizazat bhi unkey hissay mein aeay hain taham jaisa key pehley ziker hua unhain kai halqon ki taraf sey tanqeed ka nishana bhi banaya jata rahta hay shaied iss ki waja yeh hai ke Ansar Burney insani haqooq key leyea kam kertey huay kisi ka sirf Pakistani hona zaruri khaial nahin kertey aur khasusan Pakistani jailon mein band Bharti qaideon ke haq mein awaz buland kerney par unka dosron ki nigah mein qabil nafreen tharna shaiad kisi had tak qabil faham hai.

Maroof qanoon dan aur azadi-e-niswan-o-insani haqooq ki alamberdar Asma Jahangir 27 January 1952 ko Lahore mein paida hue in key walid Malik Ghulam Jilani maroof siasat dan they apnay 1968 mein Senior Cambridge kerney key bad 1969 mein kanier college Lahore mein dakhla lea Sadar Ayub key khelaf Awami tahrek uthi to unhon ney bhi college ki talbat ka aik jaloos nikala aur is ski qaiadat ki jis kipadasht mein unhain chand mah key leyeh college sey nikal dea gea issi college sey BA ki degree hasil ki.

1972 mein Asma Jahangir ka nam mulk ger shohrat hasil ker gea keonkey iss waqt un key walid Malik Ghulam Jilani ke hibse beaja key khelaf un ki patishion par faisla detey huae Supreem court ney Chief Marshallah Aid Ministrater Jeneral Yehya Khan ko „ÉªGhasib„Éªqarar dea tha Pakistan ki tarekh aur qanoon ki ketabon mein moqadma „ÉªAsma Jilani case„Éªkey nam sey mashhoor hua.

LLB Degree Asma Jahangir 1978 mein LLB ki degree hasil kerney key bad buniadi insani haqooq aur tahaffuz nuswan key lea 1980 mein apni jaddo jahad ka agaz kea Punjab Women Lowers asosi aishion qaiam ki.

Yon to Asma jahangir ki puri zindagi hi amriaat aur insani haqooq ki khelaf warzion key khelaf jado jehad kernay se ebarat hai aur unki khidmata ka kae bainul aqwami sithat par eteraf bhi kea ja chukka hay lakin un ka taza tareen karnama November 2007 se March 2009 tak General Pervez Musharraf ki amriat ke khelaf aur bad-e-azan Chief Justics of Pakistan Iftikhar Muhammed Choudhry ki bahali ke haq mein chalae janey wali tahreek mein unka numaya hissa hai iss tehreek mein unki bher pure karkerdagi ka eteraf tamam halqon ki taraf se kea gea magar Chief Justice key haq mein tehreek chalaney ka matleb yea nahin tha key Iftikhar Muhammed Choudhry un key kea kisi „ÉªMoqaddas Gae„Éªki hasiat ekhtaiar ker jatey yahi waja hay key jab Supreme Court key ful Bench ki taref dey badnama e zamana NRO key khelaf mukhteser faisla jari kea gea to iss faislay key baz nikat par apney tahaffuz ka izhar ker tey huea unhon ney iss par tanqeed bhi ki.

Asma Jahangir 1995 mein Sadar mumliket ki janib sey sitara-e-Imtiaz„Éªkey elawah sola qaumi azazat hasil ker chuki hain elawah azeen kae baeruni mumalik key imteazi inteazi award sey bhi nawaza gea.

Asma Jahangir 1995 mein unhain haqooq insani key tahaffuz ka marton Aenelz Award dea gea issi sal unhain „ÉªAwam ki khidmet key azeem jazbea ka mozahra „Éªker ney par Mag Sa Sey nawaza gea.

2001 mein unhain Aqwam e Muttahida ke tarqiati fund barae khawateeen ki taraf se Millennium Prize yani „Éªhazarey ke Inam „Éªse nawaza gea.

2002 mein Asma Jahangir ko Lisl and Leo Eitinger Prize mila.

Bachion ki moshaqqat, begari, unki jabri molazmat, tahreek nuswan key mozu par un ke moqalat shae hotey rehte hain. Asma Jahangir ki do kitabain Angreazi zaban mein shaea ho chuki hain jin ka mozu hadud ordenence aur bachchon ki jabri moshaqqat hay.

Allama Iqbal ki waldah Imam Bibi wo azeem khatoon thein jinhon ne us mard e haq agah ko janam diya jis ne apni jhanjhor dene wali shairi se umat e muslima ke tan e murda mein nai roh phonk di, mayosiyon ke andhere mein nai raoshni dekhai, jawanon ko ishq o junon ki lazat se ashna kiya, maqhoron ko khudi ka sabaq parhaya aur maghribi tehzib o falsafe ki bunyad hila kar rakh di.
Nakhunda hone ke bawajod bari mamla feham, dor andesh aur mudabir khatoon thein.
Khandan ke jhaghron ka khush aslubi se tasfiya karati thein aur muhale ki khawaten mein bari maqbol thein.
Apne tibbi gudaz aur reham dili ki badolat Imam Bibi kisi ko musibat mein nahi dekh sakti thein.
Ghurba ki amdad karna magar is andaz mein ke kisi ko khabar na ho, un ka dastor tha.
Un ka aik aur tarika ye tha ke muhale ke gharib gharanon ki das bara saal ki teen char bachyon ko apne han le atein aur un ki kafeel ban jatein.
Imam Bibi amor e khana dari ki taleem detein, silai karhai sikhatein, apni baho betiyon se parhne likhne ke elawa dini taleem dilwatein.
Jitna arsa wo larkiyan un ki tehwil mein rehtein, wo un ki dekh bhal bilkul betiyon ki tarah kartein aur shadiyon ke waqat bhi un ko betiyon ki tarah rukhsat kartein.
Shadi ke bad wo larkiyan un ke ghar isi tarah atein jese betiyan meke ati han.

Itefaq se 9 November hi Iqbal ka youm e wiladat hai chunacha apni waldah ke inteqal par Iqbal pore 37 baras ke the, is ke bawajod unhon ne apni waldah ki mout ko is tarah mehsos kiya jis tarah koi kamsin bacha nehsos karta hai.

Aap ko sakht sadma howa aur kai roz tak aap dil girifta rahe.apni waldah ki wafat ke hawale se Iqbal ne maha 
raja Parshad ko tehrir kiya:

ÈÑ≠h! Isnan apni kazori ko chupane mein kis qadar taq hai.
Be basi ka naam sabar rakhta hai aur phir is sabar ko apni himat o istaqlal ki taraf mansub karta hai.
Rana Liaquat Ali Khan ko tehreek e Pakistan ki aik khamosh rukun hone ke elawa Pakistan ke phele wazir e azam ki ahliya hone ka izaz bhi hasil hai.
School aur college mein aap numaya hesiyat ki hamil thein.
Aap ki tabai hazir jawabi, bazla saji aur shafuftagi mukhatib ko garwidah kar leti thi.
Talebat ki sargarmiyon mein aap pesh pesh rehti thein.
Liaquat Ali Khan ki sari khat o kitabat aur type ka kaam Begum Liaquat Ali Khan injam detein thein.
Siyasi kaamon mein bhi Begum Liaquat un ki madad kartein.
Rana Liaquat har mumkin had tak apne shohar ka hath batane ke elawa gharelo zimedariyan bhi pori kartein.
Begum Liaquat ne un ki parwarish nihayat zimedari se ki.

Quaid e Millat apni siyasi masrofiyat ki wajah se bachon par tawajah nahi de sakte the, is leye ye zimedari mukamal tor par begum Liaquat ke kandhon par aan pari aur unhon ne ye zimedari nihayat kamyabi se nibhai.

Ab Liaquat Ali Khan aur Begum Liaquat par nai zimedariyan aan parein mashriqi Punjab aur degar khiton se mahajireen ka jo selab umad para tha, is ki bina par Liaquat Ali Khan ka hath batane ke leye baqaidah khidmat aur bani no insan ki imdad ki tanzeem ka aghaz kiya.
Gharelo khawateen ye baat janti h na thein ke wo ghar se bahar bhi koi khidmat injam de saktein hain.

Un halat mein natajurbe kar khawateen ki tanzeem banana aur un se musibat zadgaan, nadar mohtaj afrad ki khidmat ka kaam lena yaqenan mushkil tareen kaam tha lekin Begum Rana Liaquat Ali Khan ne is kaam ka bera uthaya.
Is azeem kaam mein unhen jo kamyabi nasib hoi wo yaqenan heratnak hai.

Un ki qayadat mein natajurbekar Pakistani khawateen khidmat e khalq ke leye jis tarah mutahid hoein aur kaam kiya wo apni missal aap hai.

Begum Liaquat Ali Khan ka sab se bara karnama ÈÑ≠pwa„Éªyani aal Pakistan anjuman khawateen ki tashkil aur tanzeem hai.
Is ki wajah se un ka naam Pakistani tarikh mein hamesha zindah rahe ga.
22 February 1949 ko Pakistan bhar se unhon ne esi khawateen ko madu kiya jo zindagi ke mukhtalif shobon mein mufeed aur karaamad kaam anjam de rahein thein.
Ye Pakistan ki tamam khawateen ki anjuman hai aur is mein shirkat ke leye kisi rutbe, darje, mazhab ya firqe ki qead nahi.
Is anjuman ka maqsad Pakistani khawateen ki samaji, taleemi aur saqafati islah hai.
Is ki shakhein Pakistan ke charon sobon aur kafi zilon mein hain.
Apwa ki zer e nigrani kai school aur college khole gaye hain, hospitals qaim kiye gaye hain, amor e khanadari ka khas intezam kiya gaya hai.

Is tanzeem ka maqsad khawateen ki sahi tor par tarbiyat karna hai.

Liaquat Ali Khan ki shahadat ko unhon ne nehayat hosle ke sath bardasht kiya aur is ke baad bhi Apwa ki sargarmiyan jari rakhein.
Hukumat e Pakistan ki janib se un ko kai aala uhdon par faiz kia gaya.
Aap nihayat hoslamand aur jari khaton thein.
Begum Rana Liaquat Ali Khan ne tamam zindagi insaniyat bilkhusos khawateen ki khidmat mein guzari.
Aap bachpan hi se semab sifat, takhliqi aur mutajasis zehan ki malik thein.
Hosh sanbhalte hi apne ishteyaq ke sabab mukhtalif adyan ka mutala kiya aur Islam se behad mutasir hoein.
Is ke baad Hammer Smith College mein county council of Landon ki taraf se munaqidah fine art ke imtehan mein scholarship hasil kiya.
Art ki baqaidah taleem Sent Marten School of Art Chairing Cross Landon se hasil ki aur phir Landon council se senior scholarship of fine art lene ke bad Royal College of Art Landon mein dakhil hoein.
Royal College se art ki taleem mukamal karne ke bad Royal College hi mein associate in design muqarar hoein.

Punjab University Lahore mein aap ne bartanwi tarz ke syllabus ke bajaye American syllabus raij karwaya kyun ke bartanwi syllabus mein un ke khayal ke mutabiq ye khami thi ke theory aur practical alag alag karwaye jate the lekin American tarz ke mutabiq theory aur practical aur art ki tarikh aik sath parhaye jate the jis se talba ziyadah mustafeed hote the aur un ki dilchaspi barqarar rehti thi.
Aap ne art ki classes ki farogh mein aham kirdar ada kiya.
Anna Molka Ahmed ki koshishon se Punjab University fine art department jald hi mustehkam ho gaya aur talba ko fine art se khusosi lagao paida ho gaya.
Anna Molka Ahmed ki koshishon se 1958 mein M.A fine arts ki classes ka ijra howa aur 1960 mein B.A owners ka teen saala course bhi shuru howa.
1964 mein aap ne painters aur graphic designers ke leye peshawarana courses ka ijra kiya.

Mosam e garma ki tatilat mein aap apne khawand ke sath shumali elaqajat ki seer ke leye jatein aur qurat ke hasein manazir ko apne brush ki girift mein la kar na sirf dekhne walon ki aankhon ki dawat ka saman latein bal ke sath sath fan ke giran kardar namone bhi jama kar jatein.
Anna Molka Ahmed ke baad ane wale fankaron ne in shah paron se behad istefadah kiya aur art ki taraqi ka bais banne.
Pakistani afwaj ke leye banai gai aap ki tasweer Ë≥≠easar ul hind„Éªko behad pazirai mili aur ye tasweer aap ne Pakistani Army ke liye teen martaba taiyar ki
Anna Molka Ahmed ne taqreban nifs sadi tak fan e musawiri ki khidmat ki.
Ana Molka ne landscape, philosophical aur mazhabi paintings, drawing aur mono mantel painting ke beshumar namone bator yadgar chore hain.
Pakistan ki dehati zindagi ki akasi aur qudrati manazir un ke dil pasand muzoat mein se the.
Is ke elawa 1982 mein aap Quaid e Azam artists award 1983 mein Pakistan federation of business and professional woman club ki taraf se gold meddle ki mutahiq qarar de gaein.
Bilquis Edhi ke naam se kon waqif nahi.
Bilquis Edhi bemisal samaji karkun, Abdul Satar Edhi ki nifs behtar hain.
Aur guzishta 46 saalon se ye farz is khubi ke sath nibhati chali arahi hain ke aaj na sirf Pakistani unhen ehtaram ki nazar se dekhta hai balke un ki belos khidmaat ka sherah beron e mulk bhi hai.
Pakistani quom unhen madar e Pakistan„Éªke laqab se pukarti hai.
Yaqenan kuch afrad ese hote hain ke Allah buzurg o bartar jinhen kuch khas kaamon ke leye muntakhib karta hai.
Aur aaj wo samaji karkun aur Bilquis Edhi Foundation ki sarbarah ki hesiyat se pehchani jati hain.
Bilquis Edhi ki karkardagi ka dairah is qadar wasi hai ke mukhtasir alfaz mein jis ka ahata mumkin nahi.
Bilquis Edhi ne shohar ka sath dete howae foundation ke kaamon mein bharpor tarike se un ka sath diya.
Edhi center mein 1952 se qaim shudah jhula project ka charge bhi unhon ne bakhubi sanbhala.

Is project ke tehat ab tak mulk bhar se hazaron ki tadad mein unchahe bache panah hasil kar chuke hain. Bilquis Edhi ne logon ke leye ye aam pegham jari kiya ke Á†•nchahe bachon ko jan se na marein balke unhen humare jhulon mein dal den.
Bilquis Edhi , Pakistan bhar mein khososi tor se uraton aur bachon ke mamlat sanbhalti hain.
Wo ab tak hazaron gharib aur nadir larkiyon ki shadi ache gharanon mein karwa chuki hain.
Un ki dardmandi ka andaza is baat se lagaya ja sakta hai ke dehshat gardi ke waqeyat aur mukhtalif hadsat mein halak hone walon ke bkhire aza ko mutadid martaba unhon ne apne hathon se yakja kiya.
Hazaron lawaris bachon ko pal pos kar bara kia aur taqreban 1 lakh larkiyon ko un ke ghar pohchane ka neek kaam sar anjam deya.
Bilquis Edhi ko in khidmaat ke eteraf mein filal e Imtiaz„Éªaur amon Magsaysay„Éªaward ke elawa 350 mutafariq inamaat aur ezazat mil chuke hain jin ki tafseel khud unhen bhi yad nahi.
Tahum un ka kehna hai ke b main ne ezazat wasol karne chord eye hain.
Aur main sirf kaam par tawajah dena chahati hun kyun ke waqat kam hai aue kaam bohat ziyadah hain na jane kab humara bolawa aajaye.

Helen Keller ki kahani aik behri aur nabena bachi ki kahani hai jis ne apne andhe pan aur behre pan ke bawajod na sirf aala taleem hasil ki balke mayos logo ke dilon mein apne josh aur walwale se himat paida ki.
Miss Salon Helen Keller ki zindagi mein inqelab ban kar warid hoein
Helen Keller ke hath par pani ke nal se pani gira kar us ko pani ki hije yaad karati.
Yahan tak ke Helen Keller ke tajasus ki tasqeen ke liye Miss Salon ne Helen ki hatheli par ande se choza nikalne ka aamal tak mukamal karaya.
Is tarah Helen Keller ki zindagi mein taleem ka aghaz howa aur baad mein wo mukhtalif marahil te kar ke aik shandar musanifa bani.
Is dor mein Helen Keller bohat mehanti aur hoshiyar shagird sabit hoi aur bari asani aur josh se us ne ubhri hoi tehriron ko parhna shru kar diya.
Us ke khatot se us ki ghair mamoli sojh bojh aur us ke dilchaps khayalat ka andaza hota tha.

Helen ko ye jan kar bari khushi hoi ke aur bhi bache ese the jo us ki zaban mein batein karte the aur wo jab garam joshi se us ka hath dabate to use mehsos hota ke us ke un ke darmiyan aik ghair mari rishta hai.

1890 mein jab Helen Keller ki umar 10 saal thi to us ki ustani us ko mukhtalif mashkein karati thi jin ki madad se Helen Keller mukhtalif English horf e tahaji ki awazein likalne ke qabil ho gai taham wo bhar por awaz na likal sakti thi aur us ke bole howe alfaz sirf us ki ustani hi samajh sakti thi.
1900 mein Helen Keller ne Unani, Latini, German, Algebra aur Geometry ke imtehanat pass kiye aur red Cliff College mein dakhil ho gai.
College mein us ne agarcha nihayat masrofiyat ke aalam mein char saal guzare lekin is arse mein us ne do kitabein zeri zindagi ki kahani„Éªaur jijaiyat„Éªtakhliq kein.
In kitabon mein us ne is yaqeen ka izhar kiya ke musarrat aur shadmani ki badotal is qabil ho saki hai ke wo masher ki khidmat kar sake.

College ki rasmi taleem diploma hasil karne par khatam ho gai tahum us ki ghair rasmi taleem kabhi khtam na hoi aur ingrezi, francici aur German kutub ko parhti rahi aur naye josh o kharosh se likhti rahi.
Dosron ki madad kar ke wo khushi mehsos karti.
Rafah e aam ke kaamon aur qalmi imdad se kabhi gurez na karti.
Helen Keller ki ziyadah tar koshishein apne hi jese degar nabena afrad ke leye waqf thi.
Helen Keller zati tor par dosron ko himat delati aur un ke dilon mein zindah rehne ki lagan barhati.
Wo nabena afrad ke Mesa chastise commission ki rukun bhi banni.
Isi tarah nabena aur behre afrad ki degar kai anjomanon ki rukniyat bhi us ne qabol ki.
Rafta rafta us ki shurat barhne lagi aur aik waqat aaya ke us ke pas America aur Europe ke dor daraz shehron se bhi khutot aane ka bhi silsila shuru ho gaya.
Helen Keller ke doston ka halka bohat wasi tha.
Us dor ke mushahir ke sath us ke gehre taluqat the.
Wo nihayat bahimat aur deleer khaton thi.
Helen Keller ne tamam umar mayosi ko qareeb na phataken deya aur apne azam o himat se mazoron aur sehatmandon ki duniya mein aik esi roshan missal qaim kar di jis ko duniya yad rakhe gi.
Justice Retire Majida Rizvi bhi un basaor khawateen mein shamil hain jo mehaz apne leye nahi jetein.

Majida Rizvi ne apne liye apni jid o jehad aur mehnat se aik buland aur qabil e fakhar muqam hasil kiya, Majida Rizvi Pakistan ki pheli khatoon Judge hone ka ezaz hasil hai aur apne shube ki wo behad laiq aur muhtaram shakhsiyat hain.
Jab main ne law ki taleem hasil ki to mery samne amli zindagi mein apni salahiyaton ke istemal ka jazba aur lagan karwatein lene laga.
6 mahene bad jab mujhe qanon ke shube mein amli tor par ane ki ijazat mil gayi to January 1963 mein meri enrolment hoi aur is ke bad main ne phir kabhi palat kar nahi dekha.
Apne kaam mein is tarah magan hoi ke mujhe khud bhi ye ehsas bad meinhowa ke koi undekhi lagan hai jo mujhe yun din raat masrof rakhe howae hai.
Is tarha District Court mein apni practice jari rakhte howae main ne senior Judge ke sath family laws par kafi kaam kiya.
Main in columnon mein urton ke masail aur un ka hal batati thi.
Is doran business and professional association walon ki ema par main ne aik booklet bhi likhi jis mein Islam aur family laws ke tehat uraton ke hoqoq ki wazahat ki gayi thi.
Jo logon mein taqseem kiye gay eta ke wo apni zabanon mein baasani un masail o mamlat ko samajh sakein.
Pheli dafa mera naam gaya tha.

Jab mera naam Chief Justice ke pas tha to us waqat ki hukumat bartaraf kar di gayi thi amomi rawaiya bhi kuch hosla aafza na tha log chahate the ke aala adalati nizam mein khawateen age na ane payein jab ke lower judiciary mein kafi khawateen thein jo kaam kar rahein thein.
1994 mein jab High Court ki pheli khatoon Judge banni to ye mery leye bare ezaz ki baat thi.
Aain aur mazhab mein khawateen ko jo hoqoq deye gaye hain un se Majida Rizvi pori tarah mumain hain.
Unhon ne 50 baras tak bila takhsis rang o nasal aur mazhab o quom, bemar aur besahara afrad ki khidmat ki.
Mother Teresa ki khidmat ka almi satah par eteraf kiya gaya aur 1979 mien Mother Teresa aman ke Noble Prize se nawaza gaya.
1937 mein mazhabi half bardari ke baad unhon ne le sew kass ki senit Teresa, jise ghair mulki mublighon ka sarparast senit qarar diya jata hai, ka naam ikhteyar kar leya.
Kolkata ke gharib aawam ki halat e zar ne Mother Teresa ke dil par ghehra asar muratab kiya aur unhon ne mehaz mazhabi khidmat anjam dene ke bajaye insani khidmat ko apni zindagi ka maqsad bana leya.
1948 mien unhon ne convent chor kar Kolkata ke maflok ul haal afrad ke darmiyan aik ministry ka aghaz karne ki ijazat mangi aur ijazat miln par kaam ka aghaz kar diya.
1950 mein Mother Teresa aur un ke rofaqa ko Roman Catholic Church ke tehat charity meshes qarar de diya gaya.
1952 mein Mother Teresa ne Nirmal hriday (shafaf dil) naami idara qaim kiya jis ke bunyadi maqasid mein gharib marizon ka ilaj karna shamil tha.
Zindagi se mayos marizon ko wo apne idare mein latein, un ki khidmat katein aur ese kai afrad ko nai zindagi se hum kinar karwatein jinhein un ke doctor marz e mout mein mubtala qarar de chuke the.
Mother Teresa ka kam sirf Kolkata ya Bharat tak mehdod na raha balke duniya ke kai hisson tak pheel gaya.

Is ke bawajod wo apni khidmat anjam deti rhein lekin 1997 mien halat is nehaj par pohanch gaye ke idare ki zimedariyon ki kama haqa takmil mumkin na rahi jis par Mother Teresa ki jagah Sister Nirmala ne idare ki sarbarahi ke faraiz sanbhal leye.
Agar cha inhi dinon Lady Diana ki jawan margi ka dil kharash saniha pesh aya tha lekin is ke bawajod Mother Teresa ki mout logon par anpa asar chore baghir na rahi.

Mother Teresa agar cha is duniya se ja chuki hain lekin un ke hathon shifa pane wale mariz aur un ke idare se nai zindagi ki naveed pa kar nikalne wale afrad unhein apni yadon mien hameshah zindah rakhein ge.
Aaj bhi Lady Diana ke tazkare par bohat si aankhe nam ho jati hain.
29 July 1981 ko Princes Charles se Lady Diana ki shadi ki aik esi taqreeb thi jese log umoman khuwabon mein dekhte hain.
Lady Diana ki shakhsiyat kuch esi dil kash aur man mohni thi ke media un ki tarah khincha chala aata tha.
Shahzadi diana sirf apni shahi hesiyat aur ghair mamoli shakhsiyat ki wajah se hi media ki tawajah ka markaz nahi rahein balke is ki aik bari wajah un ki beloss samaji aur rafahi khidmat bhi thein.
Unhon ne duniya bhar mein barodi surangon par pabandi lagwane ke leye bhar por muhim chalai thi.

Mazor aur mulhik amraz mein mubtala bachon se un ki mohabat ka ye alam tha ke sakht garmi mien din bhar ka safar kar ke Africa pohanchein aur aik hospital mien aik bache ka hath pakar kar kai ghante us ke pas beti rahein, jis ki donon tangein barodi surang se urh gai thein.
Wo bacha bach nahi saka magar mehaz Lady Diana ki mohabat o shafqat ke ehsas ne us ki aziyat kam kar di.
Wo marte waqat khush tha.

Lady Diana Imran Khan ke Shukat Khanam Memorial hospital mein fundraising ki aik taqreeb mein shirkat ke leye Pakistan aaein to cancer ke mariz bachon ko bhi god mein leye bethi rahein jihein shayad un ke nihayat qarebi azizon ne bhi god mein bethana chor diya tha.

Lady Diana das (10) se zaid bare aur ban ul aqwami falahi idaron ke uhde daron mein shamil thein jin ke leye atyat jama karne ki sargarmiyon mein hissa lene ke elawa unhon ne un idaron ko apne zati sarmaye mein se bhi bari bari roqom di thein .

Guzishta aik saal ke dauran Pakistan mein ladkiyon aur aurton ke liye qaiym Edhi homes jin mein Karachi, Multan, Lahore, Islamabad, Peshawar, Quetta mein gharelo tashaddud ya deegar wajohaat ki bunyad par panah ke liye aane wali ladkiyon, aurton jin ke sath bachen bhi the, un ko aarzi taur par panah di gai.
Khyber pakhtunkhuwan mein 2012 ki ba nisbat 2013 mein bomb blast aur khudkash hamlon mein numayan kami aai.
Khidmat-e-khalq kay shube mein Pakistan aur duniya ki jani mani shakhsiyat Abdul Sattar Edhi al maroof moulana Edhi Pakistan mein Edhi Foundation kay sadar hain.
Edhi Foundation ki shakhein tamam duniya mein pheli hoye hai.
Dono ko 1986 mein awami khidmat kay shube mein saman maksa award say nawaza gaya.
App paidaishi leder thay aur shuro say hi apnay doston ki chote chote kamo aur khel tamashe karne per hosla afzai karte thay
Jab in kay walida inhein school jate waqt do pese dete to woh in mein say aik paisa kharch karlate the aur aik paisa kisi zarurat mand ki zarurat puri karne kay liye de detay.
11 saal ki umar mein inhone apni maa ko dekh bhal ka kaam sambhala jo shadeed qisim kay ziya diabetes mein mubtala thein.
Choti umar mein hi inhon nay apnay say phelay dusron ki madad karna sikh liya tha, jo agay ki zindagi kay liye kamyabi ki kunji ban gaya.
Iss kay alawa app nay yeaha apne dosto ko tadrees ki taraf bhi ragab kiya.
App nay sada tarz-e-zindagi apnaya aur dispensary kay samne bench per hi so late ta kay bawaqt zarurat fouri tour per madad ko pohunch sake.
inhone nay shehar kay nowah mein khemey lagwaye aur muft madafati adwaiyat farham kein.

Mukhiyair hazrat nay in ki dil khul kar madad ki aur in kay kamo ko dekhte huwe baqi Pakistan nay bhi imdadadi raqam say inhone woh puri imarat kharedli jaha dispensary thein aur waha aik zachgi kay liye center aur nurseon ki tarbiyat kay liye school khula aur ye hi Edhi Foundation ka aghaz tha.

Anay wale salao mein Edhi Foundation Pakistan kay baqi elaqo tak bhi phelti gai flu ki waba kay baad aik karobari shaksiyat nay Edhi ko kafi bari raqam ki imdad di jis say inhone aik ambulance khareedi jis ko woh khud chalate thay.
Karachi aur undorene Sindh kay liye woh khud rawana hote hain aur Edhi foundation ki hadsat per rade ammal ki raftar aur khidmat municipal ki khidmaat ziada taiz behtar hain.

Edhi marakazi aik khasiyat ye bhi hai kay Edhi marakz kay bahir bacha gari ka ahtemam hai ta kay khawateen bache ki dekh bhal nahi kar sakti apne bache ko yeaha chor kar ja sake is bache ko Edhi foundation apne yateem khane mein panha deti hai aur isko muft taleem di jati hai.
Edhi International Ambulance ka qiyam
Islami duniya mein Edhi foundation har musibat aur mushkil waqt mein aham imadad farham karti hai.
Foundation nay sirf Pakistan mein hi nahi bal kay bain ul aqwami satah per bhi turraki ki hai.
Begum Bilquis Edhi aur Kubra Edhi nay is mouqe per kaha kay woh duniya ka ameer ya ghareeb mulk ho wahaan mareez mareez hi hota hai.

ambulance ka maqsad insano ki jane bachana hota hai aur humay iss baat ki khushi ho gi kay Edhi International Ambulance Foundation ki ambulances duniya bhar mein insano ki janein bachayein khwa woh London, New York , Tokyo, Tilabib, Beirut aur Damishq hoon.
inhon nay kaha kay insaniyat ki ban ul aqwami khidmat kay hawale say hamara aik qadam aur age bhar raha hai.

Ajj Pakistan kay alawa Islami duniya mein bhi Edhi nay aik ghar khudgharz aur muhtarma shaks kay tour sherat pai hai shurat aur izat kay bawud inhone apni sada zindagi ko tarak nahi kiya woh sada rawati Pakistani libas pehante hain jo sirf aik ya do din in ki mumlikat hai iske alawa in ki malkiyat khele joto ka aik jora hai jis ko woh sabqa 20 sal say istemal kar rahe hain
Aur ye bhi haqiqat hai kay Edhi foundation ka begat aik caror ka hai jis mein say woh apni zat per aik paisa bhi kharch nahi karte.

Edhi Foundation Ambulance Service app kay beta Faisal batate hai jab Afghanistan mein markaz ka iftetah kiya ja raha tha to amla mehmano aur sahafiuo kay bethne kay liye kursiya kharedli jab Edhi wahan aye to woh is baat say sakht khafa huwe khun kay in kay khayal mein ye raqam kisi zarurat mand ki madad per kharch ki ja sakti thi.
Iss raat clinic kay farash per ambulance kay drivers kay sath soye.
Ajj Edhi foundation taraqi ki rah per gamazan hai.
Edhi mustaqbil ki taraf dekhte huwe kahte hain, woh Pakistan kay har alaqay mein per hospital tameer karna chahte hain.
Woh hukumat ya sabqa mazhabi jamaton say imdad bhi nahi latay khun kay woh samjhte hain kay in ki imdad mashrot hoti hai.
Edhi bazat khud bagair choti kiye taweel tareen arse tak kam karne kay alami record kay hamil hain aur record bane kay baad bhi abhi tak inhone nay chutti nahi li.

Phir apne tajurbat ke sath is mein izafe ke liye bilkhasoos batilmos ke riyazati geography ko inho ne aur aage barhaya

Hashim ko bachpan se hi Squash se dewangi ki had tak shouq tha
Hashin khan ne uss jaga ko daryaft kar liya tha jo unki aur unkey mulk ki waqar aur shohrat ki waja bani
Squash se Hashim Khan ne aisa rishta qaim kiya jo lazwal bana unhon ne khud zati tour per aur phir unke khandan ke farzandon ne iss khail se aisa nata jora ke tareekh hi badal dali
Shaid hi kisi khail mein kisi aik khandan ne aik khail per etni hukmarani ki hai
Khan family ne Squash per taweel hukumat ki hai aur yeh kahna baja hoga ke unhon ne Squash ki tareekh ko apne haton se likah hai

Iss lazwal kahani ki ibteda Hashim Khan se hoti hai Hashim ke mutaliq kaha jata hai ke unhon ne Squash ke khail ko hi tabdeel kardia Squash se dilchapsi ka yeh alam tha ke woh garam dopher mein officers ko khelta dekhte rahte they aur jab gaind Court ke bahar jati thi to uss ka taqub kerke usey wapis court mein phenk detey they
Jab afsaran khail ker lot jate they to yeh Hashim ke court mein dakhil hone ka waqt hua karta tha woh chandni raton mein dair tak akele hi khelte rahte they yahi waja hai ke un ka stemina lajawab tha
Hashim Khan gaind ke peachey bhagte bhagte kabhi nahein thakte they

Hashim naqabil yaqeen salahyaton ke malik they
Hashim cheete ki tarah phurti se gaind (ball) per lapakte they aur aise qabil e deed  strokes khelte they is ka tasawar bhi mumkin nahein tha
Isi liye  kaha jata hai ke Hashim ne Squash ke kai strokes ijad keay yeh strokes sirf wahi khail sakte they
Inn strokes ki badaulat Hashim Khan ne shuru se hi shohrat kamai aur apne harifon per dabao qaim kerne mein kamyab rahe
Hashim ne Squash ki dunia mein qadam rakhte aik toofan barpa keya
All India champion Abdul Bari ,Hashim ka pahla shikar bane yeh 1944 ki bat hai

Abdul Bari uss waqt ke behtareen khelari mane jate they jinhein drop short lagane mein khasi maharet hasil thi lakin Hashim ke samne hetyar dalne pare amm khelari Abdul Bari ke drop short ka jawab dene sey qasir tha lakin Hashim ne apne pehle hi drop short ko flap ker deya

1944 mein Bombay mein hone wale All India tournament mein shekhst khane ke bad Abdul Bari har bar Hashim Khan ka shikar bante rahe Abdul Barika zor toot chuka tha Hashim Khan ne Abdul Bari ki har martaba shikasht sey do char ker ke apni mokammal bartari ka saboot deya

Lakin Hashim Khan ko rastah faraham keya gaya aur chandah akhttha ker ke unhein qismat azmai ke leay England rawana ker deya gaya 1951 mein British open ki shirket ke leay Hashim pahonch gaey aur atey hi unhon ne dhamaka ker deya

British open sey chand din pehle Squash opoen ka ineqad hua jis mein champion Miser ke Mahmood Alkareem bhi shirket ker rahe they Mahmood guzashta char salon sey yeh tournament jeettey chale arahe they aur umeed yahi thi ke woh panchween martaba bhi kamyab lotein gein

Lakin woh final mein Hashim Khan sey takra gaey Europe ke sarzameen per pehla tournament khelne wale Hashim Khan ne chand minton mein hi Mahmood ka final mein safaya ker deya iss khabar sey Squash ki dunia mein aik tahalka mach gaya yeh aik bahot bara set tasawar keya gaya

Aor pher woh ghari agae is ka sab ko intezar tha London ke Lance down club mein British open ka agaz hua Mahmood Alkareem ne apne title ke dafa mein masroof they magar unki bad qismati ke final mein aik martabah pher Hashim Khan hi un ke samne they

Hashim ne Mahmood ke sath British open mein bhi wahi salook keya jo unhon ne Squash open final mein keya tha Mahmood ko aik martabah pher ibretnak shikasht ka samna kerna para aur almi title pehli martabah Pakistan ke pass agaya
Ab kisi ko hairat nahein thi ab sab log mutfiq ho chuke they ke Hashim Khan hi asli champion hai yahein sey iss kahani ka agaz hota hai Khan family Squash ki dunia mein aie aur cha gaie

British open per Khan family ki ajarah dari shuru ho gaie Hashim Khan ne sath martabah iss tournament ko jeeta iss dauran un ke chote bhai Azam Khan, kazan Roshan Khan aur bhanje Mohibullah Khan ne bhi apni salahyaton ka loha manwaya

1951 aur 1963 ke darmeyan hone wale 13 British open final mein rasai hasil karne wale 26 khelaryon mein sey 22 ka taluq Khan family sey tha Hashim 8 martabah British open ke final mein pahonche jabke unke bhai Azam Khan bhi sat martabah final kheley

Azam ko yeh azaz hasil hua ke unhon ne British open ka sab sey kem waqt mein jeeta apne hi kazan Roshan ko bari maharet set zair keya tha yeh bara hairat angaiz moqabla tha jis mein Azam ne Roshan ko koi moqa nahein deya shaiqeen to yeh bhi samajhne lage they ke momkin hai ke Roshan mokammal tor per fit nah on lakin aist koi bat nahein thi Azam khail per mokammal tor per chaey huey they aur Roshan jaise azeem khelari bhi bea bes ho gaey they

Iss aik tarfa final ke bad hi British open ke muntazmeen ne faisla keya tha ke teesre aur chouthe position ke leay bhi final wale din hi moqablah hua kare ga take shaiqeen ko khail ka lutf hasil ho sake

Jab Hashim, Azam aur roushan ne American cricket ko khair baad kaha to un ki nasal ne kamyabi ke safar ko jari rakha Mohibbullah Khan 1969 tek American tournament jeette rahe pher Hashim ke bare sahebzade Sharif Khan agae

North American title 13 sal mein 12 martabah jeet ker Sharif ne apne walid aur apne khandan ka ser mazeed uncha keya American cricket mein gair mamooli kar kerdagi un ki ala salahyaton ka munh bolta saboot thi
1950 ki dahai mein Khan family keg air mamooli karnamon ki badault Pakistan Squash ki dunia mein sare fahrist raha

Aftab jawed British Amateur o Champion ship jeetne mein kai martaba kamyab rahe balke unhon ne to yeh title teen sal laga tar jeeta 1964,1965,1966 mein yeh title jeet ker British Amateur Champion ship ki 44 sala tareekh mein woh teesre khelari they jinhein hat trick ka ajaz hasil hua

1964 ke bad jab Mohibbullah Khan ne British open title jeeta Pakistan ko yeh ejaz 1965 mein hasil hua iss martaba dono Pakistani khelari Qamar Zaman aur Gogi Allauddin pahonche they lahza title to Pakistan ana hi tha Qamar ne Gogi ko shikast de ker pahli martaba Open jeetne ka ejaz hasil keya

Almi cricket mein kai umda khelaryon ki maujudgi ke bawajood Jaif Hint 1976 sey 1981 tek British open ka ejaz jeette rahe Hint bahot achcha khelte they aur un ki ala technic ko matt dene ke leay kisi bahot hi azeem khelari ki zaroorat thi

Iss azeem hasti ka nam Jahangir Khan tha jis ne Hint ko Squash ko khair bad kahne per majboor ker deya Jahangir ki kahani iss fateh alam ki kahani hai jo apni na qabil yaqeen salahyaton ki bunyad per bagai ruke jadoo jagata raha unhein Squash ka Sikender E Azam bhi kaha ja sakta hai jis ke samne koi ruk nahein pata tha

Jahangir ne Squash ki dunia mein 1979 mein  qadam rakah tha iss sal Australia mein hone wali world champion ship mein unko iss leay moqa deya tha ke woh chand din pahle hi beemar per jane ki waja sey mokammal tour per sehatyab nahein huey they lakin issi sal Jahangir ne 15 sal ki umerw mein World Amateur title jeet ker yeh sabit ker deya ke uski shakal mein aik tareekh saz khelari chupa hua hai aur ane wale salon mein bilkul aisa hi hua

Jhangir Khan ke bare bhai Tourism Khan bhi aik manjeh hue khelari they Tourism Khan dunia ke 15 bare khelaryon ki fahrist mein they aur Inter National Squash Players association ke sadar bhi they un ke kazan Rahmat Khan dunia ke 12 behtareen khelaryon ki saf mein shamil ho chuke they Rahmat ke walid Nasrullah Khan Air land ke Juna Bair Ligtan ke coach rah chuke they

Rahmat Khan aur Torsam Khan ka irada tha ke woh England mein aik achche Squash club mein malkana haqooq hasil ker lein aur wahan Jahangir Khan ko bola ker training di jae take woh Australia ke Haif Hint ki mosalsal perwaz ko rokne ka bandobast ker sakein
Jahangir Khan apne barae bhai Torsam ke khail sey bahot motasir they

Rahmet ne Jahangir Khan ko dobara Squash kort mein lane mein aham kirdar ada keya Rahmet ko yeh andaza tha ke Jahangir mein khudad salahyatein maujood hain aur umda training aur coatching sey un ke khail mein mazeed nikhar paida ho sakta hai

Rahmet ne apne khandan ke buzurgon aur Pakistan Inter National Air lines ke ohdedaron ko razi ker leya ke England jaker hi Jahangir woh sare ezazat hasil ker sakta hai jis ki sab ko tamanna hai Rahmet Khan ko ejazat to mil gai lakin ajpne mansoobe ko amli jama pehnane ke leay unhein do sal ki mohlet di gai

Rahmet Khan ne iss challenge ko qabool ker leya aur apne mishan pewr rawana ho gae unhein yeh bata deya gaya tha ke nakami ki surat mein qaum ka unhein ko kerna pare ga Rahmet Khan ko na jane Jahangir mein keya nazar agaya tha ke woh shooru sey hi pur umeed dekhai dete they

Aur theek do sal bad woh khab haqeeqat mein tabdeel ho gaya woh mission kamyab raha jis per Rahmet Khan rawana huey they 28 November 1979 Torsam Khan ka inteqal hua tha aur 28 November 1981 ko Jahangir ne Canada ke shaher Toronto mein Jaif Hint ko hara ker nae Almi Champion banne ka ejaz hasil keya

Simi final mein Jahangir ne Hadayat Jahan ko shikst di thi jabke Hint ne doosre simi final mein Faqmer Zaman ko haraya tha 34 sala Hint World open mein naqabil taskher chale arahe they aur 1975 sey hone wale iss tournament mein har bar fateh lout rahe they

Hint ne pehla game 7 9 sey jeeta magar 58 minut tek chalne wale iss game sey andaza hone laga tha ke Jahangir hathyar dalne ke mood mein nazar nahein ate 56 minut ke taweel dauranya wale pehle game mein hi 34 sala Hint ko tawaqat sey zayada jaddo jahed karna pari thi

17 sala Jahangir ne Hint ko itna zayada pehle hi game mein thaka deya tha ke un ki tawanai mein kami nazar ane lagi thi Hint apne harifon ko thaka ker harane mein mashhoor they lakin iss roze woh khud shikar ho rahe they yeh umda mansooba bandi ka nateja tha Jahangir ne pehla game iss andaz mein khela tha ke usey zayada sey zayada lamba keya ja sake
Jahangir apni shason mein kamyab rahe aur agle teen game sirf 30 minut ke ander jeet leay iss tarah Hint ki kamyabyon ka silsila khatam hua aur un ki jaga aik naujawan Pakistani ne le li

Aur yahan se aik ahad ki shuruat huein aenda panch salon tek Jahangir Khan ko iss dunia ka koi bhi khelari hara na saka iss dauran unhon ne 500 sey zayada matches khele aur har martaba kamyabi hasil ki yeh aisa record hai jis ki misal Squash mein to keya kisi aur khail mein bhi nahein milti
Iss zamane mein Jahangir ke khelaf aik match to keya aik game ya sirf aik point hasil kerna bhi un ke hareef ke leay fakhar ki bat samjhi jati thi

November 1986 mein Newzi Land ke Roos Norman ne woh karnama anjam deya jis mein guzashta panch sal sey bzayada arsa mein har aik nakam raha tha Norman kai martaba Jahangir sey shikast kha rahe they lakin 1986 ke world open final mein Squash ki dunia ka azeem tareen khelari zair ho hi gaya
Jahangir ne chand hi dino bad Norman ko kai moqablon mein hara ker world open ki shikast ka badla le leya aur apni kamyabton ka silsila jari rakha

London hi mein training hasil karne wale Pakistani naujawan Jansher Khan 1986 mein Squash ki ufaq per ubhre aur Jahangir Khan ke leay aik sakht khan hareef sabit huey Jansher ke bare bhai Mohibbullah Khan junior bhi aik achche khelari they jinhon ne 1976 ka British open final khela tha

Jansherbhi bila shuba aik azeem khelari they un ka moqabla Jahangir Khan ke sath 37 martaba hua 1993 ke world open final tak dono baraber yani 18 matches jeete they akhri moqabla Jansher ne jeeta iss tarah un ke darmeyan record 18 19 ho gaya
Jahangir ki retirement ke baad almi satah per Jansher Pakistan ki wahid umeed hua kerte they Jansher ne apne weaqt ke behtareen khelaryon ko mosalsal harate rahe aur khud shazonadir hara kerte they
Bradman ke des Australia ke mayanaaz batsman, bakamaal fielder aur bemisaal captain Ricky Ponting ko naqadeen aur shaiyqeen har lihaaz se aik lajawaab cricketer tasleem karte hain
In ka shumar apne mulk he nahi, duniya ke kamiyab tareen captains mein hota hai
Wo captain kya bane‚Ä¶ in ki bating aur bhi ziyada karari ho gai
Jis ka khamyaza mukhalif team ke bowlers ko bhugatna parhta hai
Ricky duniya ke iklote batsman hain, jinho ne 2 martaba aik calendar saal ke dauran test matches mein 1500 se zaiyd runs score kiye
Ricky Ponting ki qiyadat mein ‚Äú Yellow Shirts ‚Äù new dobara world cup jeeta
Inho ne 37 test centuries banai hain aur is muaamley mein sirf Sachin Tendulkar se piche hain
Ricky Ponting ko one day cricket mein Australia ki taraf se sab se ziyada runs aur centuries banane ke aezaaz hasil hai
Ricky Ponting 2003 mein Wisden Leading Cricketer in the World aur 2006 mein Wisden Cricket of the Year ka aezaaz bhi hasil kar chuke hain
19 December 1974 ko Australia ki riyasat Tasmania ke area Launceston mein aankh kholne wale Ricky Thomas Ponting ko apni salahiyaton ka loha manwane ke liye ziyada intezar nahi karna parha
Inho ne 1995 mein sirf 20 baras ki umar mein he one dau ben ul aqwami matches aur test matches ka apna khata khol liya tha
In ka daur e urooj us waqt shuru hua, jab 2002 mein inhe Kangaroos ke One day squad aur phir 2 saal bad he test team ka bhi captain bana diya gaya

Aedaad o shumar ke aaiyne mein dekha jae to Ricky Ponting 131 test matches mein 37 centuries aur 46 half centuries ki madad se 10,960 runs bana chuke hain, test matches mein in ka oasat 56 20 hai, jab ke 310 one day international matches mein inho ne 42 72 ke oasat se 11,365 runs score kiye hain

Candidates ki list khasi taweel hai aur is mein Steve Waugh, Ellen Barden, Sachin Tendulkar aur Brian Lara jaise bohat se shohra aafaaq batsman shamil hain, lekin aedaad o shumar Ricky Ponting ke haq mein gawahi dete hain
Hashim ko bachpen se hi Squash se dilchaspi thi
Khail ka talent un mein shooru se hi maujood tha aur achchey khelaryon mein shoomar keye jate they
Apni aala salahyaton ki bunyad per Hashi Khan Ko British Air Force mein bahasyat Squash coach faiz kiya gaya tha
1949 mein pehli mertaba munaqid hone wali Pakistan professional Squash champion ship ke final mein 33 sala Hashim Khan ne 21 sala Raushan Khan ko shikast di
Un Mushkil halat mein bhi Hashim Khan ne Squash se apna rishta nahein tora aur sakht jaddo jahad kerte rahe
Hashim Khan ko apni salahyaton ka andaza us waqt hua jab unke rishtedar Abdul Bari 1950 ke British open final mein pahonche
Chand hi salon mein Hashim ke khail ka meyar buland ho chukka tha lakin unhein uska ihsas nahein tha
Hashim Khan iss baat se bakhubi waqif thay ke un ka khail Abdul Bari se kafi Behter hai
1951 mein Pakistan  air force ke officers ne chanda jama ker ke Hashim ki British open champion ship mein shirket ke liye England rawana kiya

Yeh intehai hairer ki baat thi ke woh (players) khelari jise apne watan mein khelne ki tamam sahooltein mayasser nahein thein duniya ke number aik(no one) khelari (player) ko  harane mein kamyab ho gaya
Lakin Hashim Khan ke khail mein josh tha woh walwala tha aur sub se barh ker woh jazba tha jis se woh apne hum asar khelaryon ko zair kerne ki maharat rakhte thay
Apne ala khail se Hashim Khan ne poori dunia ko hairat mein dal diya tha
1956 tek woh British open mein na qabil e taskheer rahe yani yeh title woh 6 mertaba lagatar jeete
1957 ke final mein unhein Roshan Khan ne shikast di lakin 1958 mein Hashim Khan aik mertaba phir sukhuru huye
Iss tarah Hashim Khan satween mertaba(7-time) British open jeetne mein kamyab huye jo aik naya record tha
Woh apne daur ke azeem tareen khelari samjhe jate thay
50 saal ki umer mein bhi woh aik naujawan khelari ko farig kerne ki salahiyat rakhte thay
Hashim Khan ke khail ke ahem khubi yeh thi ke woh kisi bhi lamha himmat nahein harte thay
kaha jata hai ke unhon ne Squash mein kayi new shorts ijaad kiye

Hashim Khan ka short jo sab se zaida mashoor huwa aur jo dekhne se taluq rakhta tha woh four hand cross kort drop short tha jis ke zariye Hashim Khan ne na sirf apne hareefon ko bikheir  ker rakh diya tha balke uss se Hashim Khan ne motadid points hasil kiye thay
Roshan khan iss azeem tareen khelari ke walid hain jis ne iss khelon ko naya andaz diya
Roshan Khan ke sahebzade Jahangir Khan ka nam Squash ki tareekh mein sunahre hooroof se likha jata hai
Roshan Khan khud bhi apne daur ke aik behtareen khelari thay
Roshan aur Hashim Pakistan ke ibtedai dino ke do super star thay
Unko shikst de ker Roshan ne ye sabit ker diya tha  ke Squash hi Misr ki bartari ikhtetam ki taraf gamzen hai

Misr ke Mahmood Alkareem ko 1954 ke dunlop open ke final mein hara ker Roshan Khan ne apne Roshan mustaqbil ki naweed sunayi thi Mahmood 4 (char) martaba British open title jeet chuke thay aur apne waqt ke ala tareen khelari (player) mane jate thay
Roshan Khan Bari jawan merdi se Hashim Khan ka moqabla kerte thay
Kayi tournament ke final mein Hashim ke haton shikst khane ke baad Roshan Khan ne akhir kar 1957 ke British open final mein Hashim Khan ko zair ker hi deya
Iss tarah Roshan Khan British open ka izaz hasil kerne wale doosre Pakistani khelari ban gaye
Mahreen ne iss series ko world champion ship series qarar diya tha

1957 mein Hashim Khan aur Roshan ne Australia and  New zealand ka daura kiya un dono ko wahan aik series khelne ke liya madu kiya gaya tha ta ke unka khail dekh ker maqami khelari apne khail mein nikhar paida karein teen matchon ki series Roshan Khan ne 2-1 se jeet li thi
Iss tarah ye Roshan ke liye aik bahot bari kamyabi thai
Cricket ki duniya ne ab tak jo azeem tareen player paida kiye, in mein Brian Lara top of the list hain

Lara ne college ke tournament school boy league mein 12616 runs fee innings ki oasat se 745 runs banae  Jab wo 15 saal ke the to inhe pehli baar 19 naujawan players mein shamil kiya gaya aur under 19 ki numaiydegi karne ka mauqa mila Brian Lara Trinidad and Tobago mein football aur table tennis bhi khela karte the, magar in ka khayal tha ke cricket in ki kamiyabi ka raasta hai jo inho ne sach kar dikhaya
Inhe cricket ki duniya mein The Prince bhi kaha jata hai
Brian Lara aik aise batsman hain jis ke gunn cricket ki duniya ke shaiqeen aur cricketers, sab he gaate hain

In ki salahiyaton ko dekhte hue inhe Sir Dawn Bradman, Jawed Miandad, Sir Lan Hatton, Sir Garry Sobers, Sunil, Berry Richards aur Sachin Tendulkar jaise mayanaz batsman ki suff mein shamil kiya jata hai
Inho ne west indies ki nakaam hoti hui team ko sambhala aur is ki kamiyabi ke liye sara bojh apne kandhon par utha liya
Multan test mein inho ne jarihana andaaz se bating ki aur kisi bowler se riayat na karte hue double century score ki jise sab yaad rakhenge
Brian Lara ne 131 test matches mein 11953 runs score kiye, wo test matches mein sab se ziyada runs banane ke aitebar se duniya mein 4th number par hain
Inho ne aik roza matches mein 299 innings khel kar 40
Wo munfarid aur barhe records ke maalik hain
5 roza cricket mein kae martaba sab se barhi inferadi innings khel kar aalmi record bana chuke hain

Sir Garry Sobers ke 365 runs ka 36 saal tak aalmi record bana raha tha, Brian Lara ne 1994 mein England ke khilaaf 375 runs bana ka rise bhi torh diya, phir Australian batsman Mathew Haddon ne 10 saal bad 2004 mein Zimbabwe ke khilaaf 380 runs bana kar in se yeh aezaaz cheen liya, lekin Brian Lara ne sirf 6 months ke bad he aik shandar innings England ke khilaaf khel kar 400 runs bana kar dobara new record qaiym kar diya
Yeh 5 roza test match mein kisi bhi cricketer ka ab tak sab se barha score hai
Brian Lara ko first class cricket mein yeh aezaaz bhi hasil hai ke wo aik he innings mein 501 runs banane wale wahid batman ban gae
Yeh aezaaz inho ne 1994 mein Kashair County ke liye khelte hue sabiq Pakistani cricketers Haneef Mohammad ka record torh kar hasil kiya
Cricket ki duniya par raaj karne wale Brian Lara sehar angaiz bating mein to kamiyab rahe, magar west Indian team ki captainship in ke liye masla bani rahi
3 baar in ko team ki qiyadat saunpi gai, us dauran inho ne 125 aik roza cricket matches mein se 59 jeete, 59 haarey aur 6 baghair kisi natije ke khatam hue

In ke retirement ke faisley par sabiq west indies fast bowler Wesley Hall ne afsoos ka izhaar kiya, Joel Garner aur Michael Holding ne kaha ke Brian Lara aik ache khiladi hain, in ki is salahiyat se faida uthaya ja sakta hai aur west Indian bating ki bartari barqarar rakhne au rise aage barhane mein madad mil sakti hai
Azam Khan bare mehnati aur housla wale khelari thay
Azam Khan mein yeh khoobi maujood thi ke woh apne hareef ko jald hi qaboo pane ki salahyat rakhte they
Lekin 1959 se Azam Khan ki kamyabyon aur kamranyon ka daur shooru huwa who char martaba mosalsal British open title jeetne mein kamyab huye jo aik bahat bara karnama tha
1960 ke Britsh open final mein unhon ne apne cousin Roshan Khan ko chand minutes mein hi ura deya tha

Saiqeen ye samajh rahe thea ke final bahat sakht aur sansani khaeez hoga keyon ke do aala paye ke khelari (players) aik doosre ke madd e moqabil thay dono aik aik mertaba British open jeet chuke thay aur aik bahot hi kante dar final ke tawaqqa thi
Cort mein maujood shaiqeen ko us waqt zaberdast hairat hue jab sirf chan minutes mein Azam Khan ne match jeet liya
naujawan Mohibullah ne apne tajurba kar mamoon ke khelaf lajawab khail ka mozahra kiya
Panchween aur faisla kun set mein Azam Khan ko bahat iehteyat beratna pari aur apne tamam tajurbe ko barue kar lana para
Azam ne yeh match jeet ker British open title ki Hit trick mokammal ker li
tawaqat ke motabiq yeh match bhi dilchasp aur sansani khaiz raha dono khelari (palyer) jarhana andaz apnate rahe aur shaiqeen ala khail seylutf andoze hote rahe
yeh moqabla bhi akhir tak dilchasp raha aur tareekh  ne apne app ko dohraya yani panchween aur faisla kun set mein Azam Khan aik martaba phir bazi ley gaye
Azam Khan aik phurteele khelari they aur Hashim Khan jaise Azeem khelari (palyer) bhi un se sanbhal kar khela kerte thay
British open ke elawa deeger bainul aqwami moqablon (International Squash Competitions) mein bhi Azam Khan ne kayi ahem kamyabyan hasil kein
Khush tabaa, khush zauq aur khush libaas Wasim Akram ne aesa cricket khela hai, jis ki shaiyqeen ko khuwahish thi
Ball poar jadooi giraft se inhe rafter aur swing ko qaboo karne ka hairat angez fun aata hai
Aik he action mein fast speed se wicket ke dono taraf ball karne ka fun
swing ke sultan ko duniya ke azeem tareen bowlers ki list mein shamil karta hai
Jab ke inho ne 356 one day matches mein kul 502 wickets apne naam ki hain
One day mein in ki behtareen karkardegi 1993 mein Karachi mein Zimbabwe ke khilaaf kit hi

1992 ke cricket world cup ke final mein in ki tabahkun bowling aur ghomte hue Yorkers ne aik taraf to mukhalif team ki kamar torh di to dosri taraf inhe cricket ke shaiyqeen mein gher mamoli maqboliyat dila di
Inho ne khud ko mutadid baar Imran Khan ka haqeeqi jaan nasheen sabit kiya aur kae matches mein Pakistan ki numaiydegi ke sath captain ke faraiyz bhi anjaam diye
Lekin is se in ki karkardegi mein koi farq nahi aaya
Inho ne fast bowling mein wo khobsurti paida ki
Jo is se pehle dekhne mein nahi aai thi
Yaqinan yeh baat koi nahi janta hoga ke 3 June 1966 ko Lahore mein paida hone wala yeh ladka aik din duniya e cricket ka sab se ziyada tabahkun bowler sabit hoga
Inhe bhi cricket se lagao ho gaya aur Wasim 12 baras ki umer mein apne school ki team ke bowling aur bating opener the
15 saal ki umer mein school ki team ke captain ban gae
In ki gher mamooli karkardegi ne maqami kalbon ki tawajja hasil kar lit hi

Ludhiana club ki taraf se inho ne Lahore gym khana ke khilaf behtareen karkardegi ka muzahira karte hue Rameez Raja aur Intekhab Aalam samait 4 players ko out kiya, jis par inhe cricket board ke talent camp ke liye muntakhib kar liya gaya
Jab in ki umer 18 baras hui to in ki ‚Äú In Swinger Balls ‚Äù ki shohrat hone lagi aur inho ne fast baller Khan Mohammad ki tawajja hasil kar li

Javed Miandad Wasim Akram ki bowling dekh kar bohat mutassir hue aur inhe ke zor dene par Wasim Akram ko New Zealand ke khilaaf Patterns Eleven ke 3 roza match ke liye team ke 14 players mein shamil kar liya gaya, jis ke bad 1984 mein inhe New Zealand ke khilaf Faisalabad mein hone wale aik roza international match ke liye team mein muntakhib kiya gaya
Phir inhe New Zealand ke tour ke liye bhi nominate kiya gaya
Wasim Akram one day cricket mein ziyada khush nazar aate hain, jahan wo duniya ke behtareen all rounder kehlae
Tahum aisa nahi hai ke wo sirf one day ke he player the, bal ke test cricket mein bhi in ki maqboliyat ka graph tezi se bulandi ko chu gaya tha
1989 ‚Äì 90 ki series mein Adelaide test mein inho ne Imran Khan ke sath bating karte hue qaumi team ko yaqeeni shikast se bacha liya tha
1992 ke bad inhe cricket ki duniya ka sab se ziyada tez aur sab se ziyada tabahkun bowler qarar diya jane laga
1999 ke wolrd cup mein wo qaumi team ko final tak na qabil e shikast le gae, lekin final mein Pakistan ko Australia se shikast hui
Tahum yeh ilzaam sabit na ho saka
Taqriban 2 dehaaiyon par mushtamil career mein Wasim Akram kar records bhi apne naam kar chuke hain
Wasim Akram pehle bowler hain jinho ne yeh hadaf hasil kiya hai
Inhe 17 baar test matches mein aur 22 bar one day mein ‚Äú Man of the Match ‚Äù muntakhib kiya gaya hai
Jab ke inho ne test mein 2 aur one day mein bhi 2 hat ricks ki hain
Wasim Akram apne career ke urooj mein har aik ki tawajja ka markaz the
Aaj kal wo mukhtalif channels par commentary aur IPL mein Kolkata Knight Riders ke coach ke faraiyz anjaam de rahe hain
2011 mein Wasim Akram ki mulaqat Australian khatoon Shaniera Thompson se hui aur 2 baras bad wo Shaniera ke sath shadi ke bandhan mein bandh gae
Wasim Akram pukhta iradon ke malik hain
In ek iradon ki pukhtagi ka andaza is baat se lagaya ja sakta hai ke 30 baras ki umer mein he in ki diabetes ki tashkhees ho gait hi
Is ke bawajood na sirf yeh ke inho ne apne khel ko mutassir nahi hone diya, bal ke wo apni fitness barqarar rakh kar amlan diabetes ko ab tak shikast dete aa rahe hain
Agar yeh kaha jae ke Wasim Akram un logon ke liye hausle ki misaal hain, jo apni bemari ki wajah se mayoos ho jate hain, to ghalat na hoga
Cricketer ki hasiyat se Intikhab Alam ne bowling, batting aur captain mein esa kuch khas zaror kiya hai jo tarikh mein un ka naam zindah rakhne ko kafi hai

Retirement ke bad wo coach aur manager ke tor par quami team ka tawil hissa rahe aur is sare dor mein Pakistan ne bohat si yadgar fatohat hasil kein, jin mein numayan tar 92 ke worldcup mein kamyabi hai
Pakistan cricket board mein unche oddon par faiz rahe, sar e dast director domestic cricket hain
Test cap hasil kar lene par bowler ki khuwahish hoti hai bas jald azjald apna phela wicket hasil kar le
Is tago do mein bazon ko khasa kasht katna parta hai magar baz thori kawish ke bad manzil sar kar lete hain
In 2 sorton se hat kar test cricket tarikh mein 19 qismat ke dhani ese guzre hain jinhon ne apni pheli bowl par hi batsman ko thikane laga diya
Intikhab Alam Pakistan ki taraf ke test double karne wale phele cricketer hain yani 200 wickets aur 1000 runs banane wale
1973 mein Pakistan ne New Zealand ko us ki sarzamen par zer kiya to is tarikhi fatah mein Intikhab Alam ne 11 wickets le kar bunyadi kirdar ada kiya
Batting mein bhi kai bar kare waqat mein team ki ayanat ko aaye
1976 mein Oval test mein Asif Iqbal ke sath mil kar nawen (9th) wicket ki sharakat mein 190 runs jor kar alami record banaya jo 30 saal qaim raha
First class cricket mein bhi Intikhab Alam ke cricket ka sitara khub chamka
County cricket mein Intikhab Alam ke johar khub khule
1971 mein Sire county 13 saal bad county champion bani to us mein Intikhab Alam ki umdah bowling ka bhi dakhal tha

1970 mein middle sixes ke phel 8 batsmanon ko pavilion ki rah dikhai nawan (9th)bhi un ka shikar ban jata agar Robin Jackman, jihon ne akhiri 2 khilari out kiye, un ki bowl par aasan catch na gira dete
Badazan ye match mein century karne mein kamyab howe, is leye agar wo innings mein 10 wickets hasil kar pate to munfarid record ke malik ban jate
Pakistan cricket team ke captain ki hesiyat se un ki khidmat ko nazar andaz nahi kiya ja sakta
Abdul Hafeez Kardar ki retirement ke bad Pakistani cricket mein banjar dor aaya aur 60 ki dihai mein humari karkardagi dawan dol rahi
Is arse mein England ke aik dore mein hum aik sires 4-0 se hare to dosri mein 2-o se
in dosron ke bad Pakistani team ne jo dere kiya in mein Intikhab Alam ki catnaini mein behtareen karkardagi ka muzahirah kiya

1971 mein Edgbaston test mein jab Pakistan ki jeet yaqeni dekhai de rahi thi, barish England ki madad ko aan pohanchi, Lords test mein jeet ke qareeb aakar naqis batting ke bais jeta match 25 runs se har gaye
Wisdon ne likha ke Pakistan is dore mein haqiqi qowat ke tor par ubhra hai
1974 ki series mein hum na koi test match hare or na koi first class match
1948 mein Bradman ki ‚ÄúThe Invicibles‚Äù team ke bad Pakistan ki pheli team thi jo baghar koi match hare England se wapis palti
In doron mein team ka hissa rehne wale Imran Khan ka kehna hai ke team par goron ka is qadar nafsiyati dabao hota ke hum jeta howa match har jate
Is leye jab wo captain banne to unhon ne is team ko is khuf se nijat dilai
Is bare mein jab Intikhab Alam se pocha to unhon ne bataya, un dinon doron mein hum ne bari achi karkardagi dekhai
7 larke England mein county khel rahe the, jis se un ko bohat kuch sekhne ko mila
Ye durust hai ke aik do martaba hum jeet ke kafi nazdik aaye, magar har gaye, to is ki wajah khuf aur dabao nahi tha

Is mudat mein cricket ke sath job hi acha bura howa is ke bare mein first hand information un ke pass bohat hai, lekin barae naam maslehatan khlte nahi, aur esi baat kam hi batate hain, jis se tarikh ka record durust ho sake
Aur to aur wo apne sath hone wali ziyadatiyon par bhi dil ke phaphole phorte nahi, aur kisi kirdar ka naam bata den ye to namumkinat mein se hai
Pakistan team mein hone wali baghawaton ka zikar karen to baat gol kar jayen ge
Manager ke tor par nakhushgawar waqeyat ke bare mein daryaft karen to bhi tal jate hain
Is sort e haal mein Intikhab Alam Imran Khan ke sath khare rahe
Intikhab Alam Pakistan ki one day team ke phele captain hain
Un ki zer e qayadat 1974 mein England ke khilaf do one day Pakistan ne khele aur kamyabi hasil ki
Pakistan ne sire se practices match khela to unhon ne county team ki taraf se 95 runs bana dale
Is moqe par wahan mojud tamashaiyon ne team se un ke ikhraj par ahtejaj bhi kiya

Hanif Muhammad ke benul aqwami cricket se alag hone se mutaliq pocha to wo bole ‚ÄúHanif Muhammad kamal ke batsman the, un ke ghuthne mein problem thi, team mein bhi ahsas yehi tha kea b unhen retire ho jana chaheye
Main nahi samajhta ke Kardar ne un ki retirement ke silsile mein koi zabardasti ki

Pakistan cricket par hal hi mein shaya hone wali Peter O‚ÄôBrian ki lajawab kitab ‚ÄúWonder Tiger A History of Cricket in Pakistan‚Äù mein Sadiq Muhammad ka bayan naqal howa hai, jis ke mutabiq West Indies ke khilaf aik match mein captain Intikhab Alam ne unhen ghair zarori tor par short leg par khara kiya aur phir full tos phenk di jis par batsman ne zordar hit lagai aur wo shaded zakhmi ho kar hospital pohach gaye aur marte mate bache
Idhar cricket ke leye ghar ke indar aur barah mawafiq mohol mayasar aaya

Mera car modification ka kaam hai aur meray customers ko yeh HID bohat pasand hai. mashaAllah se thoray se customers ne request kee hai inko yehee wali HID chayiey.
