Chaudhry Rehmat Ali  ne 28 January 1933 ko ‚ÄúAb Ya Kabhi Nahi‚Äù(Now Or Never) ke naam se aik ketabcha shaya kiya jis mein na sirf aik alehda Muslim Watan ke qayam ki tajweej pesh ki gaye balkey majuza Muslim watan ko Pakiktan ke naam se mousom kiya gaya

Chaudhry Rehmat Ali nay apni tajweej mein Punjab sey ‚ÄúP‚Äù suba Sarhad key Afghanon sey ‚ÄúA‚Äù Kashmir sey ‚ÄúK‚Äù Sindh sey ‚ÄúS‚Äù aur Balochistan sey ‚ÄúTan‚Äù ley ker unko apas mein       jor ker ‚ÄúPakistan‚Äù banay

pehla resala 1933 mein Chaudhry Rehmat Ali ne Cambridge ( Britania) sey jari kiya jo Pakistan Qaumi Movement ka terjuman tha
Hindustan mein haft Roza ‚ÄúPakistan‚Äù June 1936 mein Abbottabad Soba Sarhad sey nikla jis key editor Syed Ghulam Hussain Shah Kazmi they
1937 mein Punjab key Maulvi Ibrahim Ali Chushti ney ‚ÄúTehreek e khilafat Pakistan‚Äù shuru ki aur iss hawaley sey aik skeem pesh ki
7 Augusst 1937 ki Nawab Ahmed Yar Khan Daultana ney apney aik mazmon mein ye  kiyal zahir keya key Congress ki policies ka natija yaqinan Pakistan ki sorat mein baramed hoga

Pakistan key nam sey dosra resala Qanoon saz Assembly key rukun aur maroof sahafi o shayar Maulana Farooq Dewa Gorakhpuri (professor Majnun Gorakhpuri key walid) ney January 1939 mein Lakhnow sey jari kiya ye bhi haft roza tha

Iss mein Maulvi Mohammed Farooq Dewana Gorakhpuri ney ba hasiat Sadar taqrer kertey huye Choudhary Rehmat Ali ki skeem per roshni dali aur unki taqreer key dauran samayein barabar "Pakistan Zindabad" key narey buland kartey rahey
Islam den e fitrat hai jis mein ese zawabit paye jate hain jo insani mizaj aur zaroriyat ke aan mutabiq hain
Islam khatoon ki izat aur toqeer ka dars deta hai
Isi fitri zarorat ke pesh e nazar Islam khatoon ki izat o ahteram ki taked karta hai
Kyun ke ye Hawa ki beti ka mamla hai, imtiaz ka nahi, niswani nazakat aur hifz e maratib pesh e nazar hai kuch aur nahi
Har musalman ko is baat par kamil iman rakhna chaheye ke islam insani hoqoq ka alam badar aur mashi aur samaji masawat ka dai hai
Islam masher ke tamam afrad ke hoqoq ki zamanat deta hai aur kisi fard ya giroh ya jins ki bunyad par imtiaz Islam ki roh ke khilaf hai
Ye din khawateen ke hoqoq ki jid o jehad ki yad delata hai

Phir 1908 mein America ki socialist party ne khawateen (women) ke masail hal karne ke leye Women National Commission banaya, jis ne khawateen (women)  ke almi din ke leye sifarishat mauratab kein, ta ke khawateen (women)  ke haq e ray dahi ke leye aik munazam muhim ka aghaz kiya jaye

Social democratic woman society ne 8 March 1908 ko New York mein khawateen ke hoqoq ke leye aik ijlas munaqed kiya, jis ke nateje mein American socialist community ne 1909 mein February ke akhiri hafte mein khawateen ka alami din manane ka elan kar deya

Socialist khawateen ne 1909 aur 1910 mein khawateen ke aki ijlas munaqid kiye aur women national commission ne 1910 mein socialist national congress ko sifarish pesh ki ke February ke akhiri itwar (Sunday) ko khawateen (women)  ka almi din qarar deya jaye
Phir August 1910 mein Copan Hagan mein socialist conference munaqid ki gayi jis mein tajwiz de gayi ke is din ko almi satah par bhi khawateen ka din qarar diya jaye
Conference ke doran ye tajwiz manzor kar li gai aur is tarah khawateen ka almi din wajod mein agaya
1917 mein Russia ki khawateen ne apne hoqoq  manwane ke leye gharon aur factoryon se sarkon par akar aik pur josh muzahira kiya
Is tarikhi waqeye ne khawateen ki duniya badal di
Is muzahire ke bad peter grad mein hartaal hoi aur khawateen (women) ka ye ahtejaj is had tak phel gaya ke aik hafte ke andar Zar Nicolas dom medan chor kar bhagne par majbor ho gaya
Almi satah par rosi khawateen ki is jurat ko saraha gaya aur Russia mein 8 March ko khawateen ka din qarar de diya gaya

1960 ki dehai ke akhir mein khawateen ki tehrikon mein aik naya ubhar aaya to 8 March ko almi yom e khawateen ke tor par manane ka mutalba aik pur zor tehrik ki shakal mein samne aaya aur socialist mumalik ke sath un mimalik mein bhi 8 March ko khawateen ke din ke tor par manaya jane lag ajahan  ye din dosri tarikon ko manaya jata tha
Shuru mein socialist paas e manzar ke bais America ki taraf se is tajwiz ki mukhalfat ki jati rahi, tahum 1981  mein wahan bhi 8 March ko khawateen ka din tasleem kar leya gaya
1975 se 1995 tak khawateen ki char (4) almi conferences munaqid hoein, jin ka maqsad duniya bhar ki khawateen ki numaindagan ko aik plate form par akhatta kar ke un ke masail ki nishan dahi karna tha
In conferences mein khawateen ke infaradi masailse le kar almi satah tak ke masail par tafsil se giftogo ki gai, aur sifarishat par mushtamil elamiye bhi jari keye gaye
Ye naya musawida e qanon mustaqbil mein Pakistan mein khatoon ke muqam aur hoqoq ke taiyon mein bunyadi ahmiyat ka hamil hia
Duniya ke har mullk mein aain ki bunyadi amarat insani hoqoq par khari hoti hai
In mein sheriyon ko khush haali, azadi, masawat, izzat e nafas jise bunyadi hoqoq shamil hain
Riyasat is dastawez ke zarye is baat ko tasleem karti hai ye wo har qemat par sheriyon ko ye hoqoq faraham kare gi aur in hoqoq par amal dar aamad ko yaqeni banane ke leye har mumkin iqdamat kare gi

khawateen ke hoqoq ki jab baat aati hai to 8 March ka din is hawale se khasi ahmiyat ikhteyar kar jata hai ke har saal is din pori duniya mein is haqeqat ko tasleem kiya jata hai ye khawateen ke hoqoq bhi insani hoqoq hain aur ye ke mashi aur mashrati taraqi sanfi masawat ke baghair mumkin nahi

8 March ko agar khawateen ko un ke hoqoq dene ki baat hoti hai to har satah par is azam ka izhar bhi zarori hai ke bahesiyat insan khatoon ko izat aur masawi hesiyat dena ho gi,khatoon ke khilaf hone wali istehsaal aur har shakal ke tashdud ko jar se ukharna ho ga
Khatoon par har kisi ka tashadud  khatam karne ke leye sirf qawanin bana dena hi kafi nahi, balke unhen behtar banana aur un par baqaidah amal dar aamad ko yaqini bana bhi zarori hai
8 March ka din mehaz taqarir karne ka din nahi balke ye din duniya bhar mein khawateen ke hoqoq ki bahali ka din hai
Aham baat ye bhi hai ke apne hoqoq ke hosol aur tahafuz ke leye mardon ki taraf dekhne ke bajaye khawateen ko khud bhi aik dosre ke hoqoq ka tahafuz karna ho ga
Usi zamane mein behtaren mazmon lekhne par lord lanes down se tamgha hasil kiya
Sir Syed ki dor andesh nigahon ne Molvi Abdul Haq mein wo sab kuch pa leya jise wo dekhna chahate the
Un ki zindagi ka baqi hissa Urdu ki farogh aur is ki tarwij ke leye makhsos raha, is leye quom ne unhen Baba e Urdu ke naam se nawaza
Baba e Mlolvi Abdul Haq ne Urdu zaban ki esi khidmat injam di jis ki missal dosri zaban ki tarikh mein nahi milti
Baba e Urdu Molvi Abdul Haq mahir e Lesaniyat the aur tehqiq o tanqed ke mahir bhi
Unhon ne lughat aur tarikh zaban tartib de
Unhon ne Karachi mein urdu College ki bunyad rakhi aur aik team bana kar is ke mansobe ko amli jama pehnate rahe

Un ki khuwahish rahi ke apni zindagi mein Urdu College ki bunyad rakh den magar qudrat ko ye manzor na tha lekin aaj hum dekh rahe hain ke Urdu University qayam ho chuki hai aur apna kaam jari rakhe howe hai
Tadbar koshish aur mehnat ko faraiz aur wajebat ka darja dete the
Baba e Urdu mutale, mushahide aue mukalme ke adi the
Mutale ki adat un ki zindagi ka juz thi
Tamam zindagi ke mushahidat ko unhon ne yak jan kiya aur quom ke mutale ke leye unhen chor deya
Akhbarat, risale aur tarikh par unki gehri nigah thi
Sidq aur nigar dilchaspi se parhte the
Jab parhte parhte thak jate to ehbab se parhwa kar sunte
Parhne ke bhi uqat the aur likhne ke bhi, un ki adat thi ke wo mazmon ko aik hi nashist mein pora lekhte
Anuman e taraqi e Urdu ki bunyad 1902 mein Dehli mein rakhi gai jis ke phele muhtamim e aala Molana Shibli Nomani the, jo Hyderabad mein beth kar anjuman ke intazamat dekhte the
Us waqat anjuman e traqi e Urdu ke liye Molvi Abdul Haq lazim o malzom the
Un ka naam Abdul Haq tha aur anjuman ka naam taraqi e Urdu
Molvi sahib ne apni rkar guzari se anjuman ko Hindustan ki bawaqar anjuman bana deya
Anjuman ka sab se shandar kaam qadem Dakni adab aur shura e Urdu ke tazkiron ki  ashat hai
Mukhtalif ulom ke tarajum tasanif, talifat, nisabi kutub aur angrezi Urdu lughat ki tadwene se karname hain jo tarikh aur Urdu ki kitab (books) mein hamesha jagmagate rahein ge
Widya mandir scheme ke muhaz par anjuman taraqi e Urdu ki yalgharon aur fatohat ki fehrist bari tawil hai aur ye sirf aik hi mard e mujahid ka kaam hai jise hum Baba e Urdu ke naam se yad karte hain
Molvi Adul Haq hama jehat shakhsiyat aur apni zatmein aik aik anjuman the
Urdu ke leye apni khidmat ke sile mein unhon ne Baba e Urdu ka khitab paya
Wo aik mumtaz nasar nigar, muhaqiq, mahir e talem aur mutazim the

Unhon ne nasar nigari mein sir Syed aur Hali donon ke asrat shamil keye aur un jesa hi aslob ikhteyar kiya wo Sir Syed ki tehriron se ziyadah mutasir howe  is leye unhon ne sadgi aur salasat ke bawajud Sir Syed ki tehrir ki shagutagi ko pesh e nazar rakha aur Hali jesi rokhi pheki tehrir lekhne se gurez kiya albata un ki nasar mein kush tabi aur sanjidgi ka aik haseen tawazun paya jata hai
Un ki tehriron mein besakhtagi aur rawani hai
Is leye kuch hazrat ke nazdek un ki tehrirein mazamin ke bajaye taqrir kehlane ki mustahiq hain
Basakhtagi aur rawani ne Molvi sahib ki tehriron mein bari dilkashi aur ranai peda kar di hai
Wo apni rawani tehrir mein qari ko bhi apne sath baha kar le jate hain
Unhon ne bila zarorat adaq zaban aur angrezi alfaz lekhne se gurez kiya
Unhon ne hindi zaban ke subuk alfaz bhi istemal kiye jin se un ki nasar mein aik ajeeb se chashni peda ho gai
Un ki tehriron mein ba payan khulos paya jata hai
Un ki tehrir parh kar yun mehsos hota hai ka is ke alfaz moye qalam se nahi balke dil se nikle hon
Isi sachai aur khulos ne Molvi Abdul Haq ko shurat e aam aur baqa e dawam ata kiya
Molvi Abdul Haq aik kamyab marqa nigar aur sawanah nawis hain
Un ke tamam marqaat sachai aur ghair janibdari se ebarat hain

Unhon ne jin afrad ki sawanah tehrir ki ya un ki shakhsiyat par izhar e khayal kiya un ki serat ke tama m pheloon par seer hasil behas ki phir sab se bari baat ye hai ke aam tor par bashtar marqa nigar ke bajaye apni zaat ko numaya karna chahate hain , wo us ke aur apne zati taliqat ke hawale se ese waqeyat samne late hain jin mein un ki shakhsiyat bar bar numaya ho kar ati hai
Taham Baba e Urdu ki marqa nigari is saqam se pak hai
Wo apne qalm ko us ki shakhsiyat ki serat tak mehdod rakhte hain jis ka khaka tehrir kiya ja raha hai ya sawanah likhi ja rahi hai
Taham agar kabhi musanif ki shakhsiyat jhalakti hai to is ka aks bara e naam hota hai jo aik chand jumlon ya aik  adha paragraph tak mehdod rehta hai

Unhon ne sirf marof aur aham shakhsiyat hi par qalm nahi uthaya balke Naam Dev Mali aur Noor Khan jese aam admiyon ke khake bhi likhe kyun ke Molvi Abdul Haq k na sirf phol hi mein aan nazar nahi ati wo to kante menbhi aik shan dekh kar mutasir ho jate hain
Molvi Abdul Haq ka sab se bara karnama ye hai ke unhon ne Urdu ke qadem sarmaye nazam o nasar ko daryaft karne aur is ka tahfuz karne ke silsile mein baqaidah aik tehrik chalai
Is tehrik ke natije mein Molvi sahib ki infiradi koshihson se Urdu ke naamwar qadem shura aur nasar nigaron ke nadir o nayab tazkare, qalmi kutub aur majmoi kalam dastiyab howe
Nizami ki qadem masnoiyon, Phol bin Nashati ki razm aama aur Molla Wajhi ki dastan sab ras ki daryaft Molvi sahib ki sai musalsal se hi mumkin ho saki
Molvi sahib ne qadem mehzotaat mein baqidah tehkik ki, un par tabsare kiye, unhen shaya karaya, is koshishs ki badolat bashumar mehzotaat zewar e taba se arasta ho kar ehl e  elm ke samne aye
Urdu College ka qayam Molvi Abdul Haq ka aik aur azeem karnama hai
Is Coolege mein fanon, qanon, science aur tejarat ki teleem Urdu mein hi de jati hai
Is College mein MA, MSC aur LLM ki taleem bhi de jati hai jin ka zarya e taleem Urdu hai
Molvi Abdul Haq ne Urdu ko Pakistan ki qaumi zanban banane ke silsile mein zabardast jid o jehad ki

Unhon ne na sirf apni taqriron aur tehriron ke zarye qaumi renumaon aur hukam ko mutawajah kiya balke 1951 mein unhon ne Urdu ke haq mein aik shandar awami jaloos nikala jis ke shurka ki tadad aik lakh se zaid thi
In hi koshishon ka samar ye tha ke 1956 ke dastor mein Urdu ko bahesiyat qaumi zaban ke taslim kar leya gaya
Molvi sahib ne anjuman e taraqi e Urdu ke zer e ahtemam do adad ilmi aur adbi jaraid, Urdu aur qaumi zaban bhi jari kiye
In jaraid mein anjuman ke maqasid ki tashher ke elawa mayari elmi aur adbi mazamin, shura ka mayari kalam aur elaqai zabanon ke mazamin aur afsanon ke tarajum bhi shaya kiye jate hain
Molvi Abdul Haq  ne aik mustanad aur mayari angrezi Urdu lughat bhi tarteb di
Unhon ne beshumar mutaradifat bhi ejad kiye
Molvi Abdul Haq ki koshishon se Karachi mein anjuman e taraqi e Urdu ka aik jaded chapa khana anjuman press ke naam se qaim howa
Is press ke qayam ki badolat anjuman ke leye apni kutub ki ashat mein bohat asaniyan peda ho gaein
Anjuman ke apne risale Urdu aur Qaumi zaban esi press mein shaya howe

itna pyara phone hai yeh main iski performance se bohat mutameen hoon , dikhne mein itna acha hai aur fast b hai .. camera iska bohat hi ziada acha hai . hang bilkul nahi hota na heat up horaha hai ab tak k istemal mein, umeed karta hon agay b aise hi chalega :)

Phone tou no doubt bohat smart hai, looks mein bhee pyara aur qeemat mein bhee bohat zyada nai hai, tou aik achi choice hai kharedari ki. Is ka camera price kay hisab se bohat acha hai, light mein ya dark mein, picture quality bohat achee aatee hai, aur battery bhee lagbag aik din poora nikla letee hai. System ka istemal bhee mezay ka hai, android OS chalanay mein koi masla nai karta, lekin 1 GB ram honay ki waja se kabhi kabar mushkilat paish aatay hain. Jaisay mein social media bohat use karta hoon tou saray caches ram pe bhari parh jatay hain aur ram perform nai kartee, phone lag hona shuruh krdetee hai. Kbahi contacts mein scroll kartay waqt phone hang hojata hai aur number dial krne kay 30 seconds baad pata chalta hai kay call lag gayee hai ya nai, jab kay phone bohat lag krta hai. Lekin lagging kay elawa, budget mien yeh phone bohat acha hai, nbas mein yehee recommend karoonga kay iskay naye model mein ram ki behtari karein. 1GB ab kaun use karta hai? :P

One Man Show ka yeh silsila Zia Mohyeddin in ki khobsurat tajseem o tehzeeb mein khas malika rakhte hain
Wo ashaar ke ilawa lafzon aur jumlon ko bhi is qadar pur kashish bana dete hain ke audience mashoor hue jate hain

Maroof actress model Mathira ne 2014 mien apni all rounder performance se showbiz ke mukhtalif shobon par raaj karne ka aelaan kar diya
Aik taraf to Mathira film aur Tv mien acting ke johar dikhaeyngi, jab ke mezbani ke sath sath mauseeqi ki duniya bhi apni salahiyaten mutarif karwaengi
Mathira ne singing ki duniya mien qadam rakhte hue kuch geet record kar liye hain
Jab ke in ki video mukammal hote he aik ranga rang launching taqreeb ka ineqaad bhi kiya jaega
Is hawale se Mathira ne bataya ke Pakistan he nahi Indai mien bhi kuch project sign kiye hain
Jis ki wajah se rawa‚Äôn baras mien mukhtalif andaaz ke sath choti aur barhi screen par jalwagar hoti rahongi
Is ke liye main ne aik behtareen composition wale geet ko record kiya hai aur ab is geet ka video bhi banaya jaega
Inho ne kaha ke main janti hon ke music aik mushkil kaam hai aur is ke liye music ki samajh bojh hona bohat zarori hai
Main music ko samajhti hon aur jin logon ne meri awaaz sun rakhi hai wo jante hain ke main acha gaa sakti hon
Isi liye main ne acting, modeling aur hosting ke baad singing ke shobey mien qadam rakha hai
Yeh mere chahne walon ke liye surprise ho ga, magar mujhe umeed hai ke jab wo mera geet sunege to use khob enjoy karenge
Urdu zuban mien record kiye jane wale geet mien nachne aur jhomne ke liye hum ne original saaz istemal kiye hain
Jahan tak geet ke video ka talluq hai to us ko jadeed technology ke sath shoot kiya jaega, ta ke mera geet sirf Pakistani channels par he nahi, bal keg her mulki music channels se bhi on ear ho sake
Aik sawal ke jawab mien Mathira ne bataya ke main all rounder rahon aur bataur all rounder acting, modeling, hosting aur singing jari rahegi
Is liye mujhe jo bhi kaam acha lagta hai, main zaroor kar rahi hon, lekin film ka naam apne role aur film ki kahani ke barey mien kuch nahi bata sakti
Kyun ke main ne yeh iradah kiya hai ke 2014 mien apne chahne walon ke sath sath mukhalfeen ko bhi surprise don to is le liye sab ko sabar karna ho ga
Lekin is se mujhe koi farq nahi parhta
Mera focus apne kaam ki taraf hai
Jis ko jari rakhongi
Main ne apne kaam ke hawale se rawa‚Äôn baras ke liye jo schedule tarteeb diya hai Is mien film, TV aur music ke ilawa beron mumalik programs mein performance bhi shamil hai
Is liye yeh saal meri kamiyabiyon aur career mien nae direction ka saal hai
Mathira ne aik sawal ke jawab mien bataya ke fashion industry ke liye bohat se projects sign kiye hain
Fashion shows mien cat walk to nahi lekin Tv commercials aur photo shoot ke projects mien kaam karongi
Bohat se Multinational brands ne is silsila mien apni products ki tasheer ke liye sign kiya hai
Jis ke liye Malaysia mien bhi kuch photo shoot kiye jaenge
Inho ne kaha ke hamare mulk mien private productions ke banner taley bohat se ache drama banae ja rahe hain
Is liye ab aane wale nae dramas mien, main baqaiyda kuch sanjeeda roles mien dikhai dongi
Wo dekh saken ke main sanjeeda kaam karne ki aehal hon aur ab in ko mere kaam ke zariye he behtar jawab milega
Lollywood Actress Resham ka kehna hai ke baaz actresses meri kamiyabiyon se hasad karti hain lekin mujhe in ki qatai koi parwah nahi hai
Main naik niyati se apne kaam par tawajja markooz kiye hue hon aur is ka mujhe phal bhi mil raha hai
Yeh sirf ALLAH PAK ki zaat hai jo zarre ko aaftab bana deta hai
Main apne tamam fankar sathiyon ki izzat karti hon aur in ki shandar performance par in ko mubarakbad deti hon
Geo aur Jeene do mera falsafa hai aur agar hum is par karband ho jaey to is mulk ke masaiyl barhi had tak kam ho sakte hain

Razia Sheer Khan: Bilkul aik ache trainer ke sath sath ache nutritionist ki bari ahamiyat hai
zahir hai ke aik balance diet aap ki karkardagi ko aage barhane mein mawin sabit hoti hai
is mein protein ka imtezaj aur pani ka istemal bari ahamiyat ka hamil hota hai
Question: Apni karkardagi ko behtar banane ke leye rozana kitne ghante practice karti hain?
Unhen hukumat ki janib se har tarah ki support hasil hoti hai
yahan ke athletes job karne ke elawa zindagi ki tamam mushkilat bardasht karne ke sath sath kheelne ke leye waqat nikalte hain aur mulk ke leye bohat kuch karne ka jazba rkhte hain
Main aik baat zaroro kahon gi ke in tamam mushkilat ke bawajod Pakistan mein talent ki koi kami nahi hai
agar tartan track achi ho gi to aap ki training aur practice ka mayar bhi acha ho ga,
achi tartan track par training ke doran aap enjoy karte hain,
aap ko is mein bounce milta hai jis se karkardgi behtar bannane mein madad milti hai
Question: Aik athlete ko apni karkadgi behtar banane ke leye ache joggers (jote) kitana aham kirdar ada karte hain?

Razia Sheer Khan: Haqiqat to ye hai ke mayari joggers mehange to hote hain lekin in ka balance bohat acha hota hai jo aap ki karkadagi ko na sirf behtar karta hai balke aap bohat acha mehsos karte hain
Ye baat bilkul sahi hai ke mayari joggers majmoi karkardagi ko behtar banane mein dosri cheizon ke sath sath aham kirdar ada karte hain
Question: Pakistan ki kis athlete khatoon se sab se ziyadah mutasir hain?
Razia Sheer Khan: Main Pakistan ki international athlete Shazia Khan se bohat mutasir hun
main ne jab quomi satah par ibteda ki to na sirf main ne un ko ideal banaya balke un se training bhi li
Ye ibteda mein un ki training ka hi natija tha ke mujhe un se bohat kuch sekhne ka moqa mila aur apni karkardagi ko behtar banane mein kamyab rahi
Is se phele Snidh games par nazaren hain jis mein aik martaba phir apni sabiqa achi karkardagi ko dohrana chahon gi
Mujhe is baat ki khushi hai ke main ne 2013 ke games mein infaradi tor par sab se ziyadah 8 gold medals leye the, jo aik record hai
main chahon gi ke is record ko mazid behtar banao
Razia Sheer Khan: Abhi to mereghar walon ne mujhe har tarh ka support kiya hai
main samajti hunk e karkardagi ko behtar banane aur tasasul ko qaim rakhne ke leye achi mulazimat ki bari ahamiyat hai

Mohibullah ne 3 mertaba British open ke final mein pahonche magar teeno mertaba woh Azam Khan ke vhaton shikast sey do char ho gae final mein bhi unhon ne bahot zaberdast khail ka mozahra keya megar un ke mamoon ne apne tajurbe sey faida uthate hue bazi jeet li
Akhir kar British open title Mohibullah ke hisse mein 1962 mein aya yeh sabit qadmi ki fatah thi unki mehnat rang lai aur qismat neb hi un ka khoob sath deya
woh ibtedai round ke matches mein behtareen kar kerdagi ka mozahra kerke final mein pahonche they
1964 mein Mohibullah ne apne bare mein apne mamoon Hashim Khan ko do bare tournament ke final mein shikast di pehle unhon ne US open jeeta aur phir candian open
1964 mein Mohibullah ko America mein koching ka moqa bhi mila Boston mein qaim Harrods club ne Mohibullah Khan ko professional coach moqarar kiya tha
Many times, he has elected President of the World Squash Federation
Squash ki Duniya key leyea bea taj Badsha aur tareekh key behtareen khelari Jahangir Khan 10 December 1963 key roze Karachi mein paida huae
Jahangir Khan na Squash ke maidan mein Pakistan ka nam roshan kei
Iss ke baad Jhangir Khan ke walid Roshan Khan aur bhai Torsam Khan kamyabian hasil kein te rahe
App ney pehli kamiabi September 1979 mein 16 sal ki umer mein gair peasha wer khelaryon ki almi chapion ship jeet ker hasil ki

iss waqae ney Jhangir Khan ki nafsiat par ghara aser dala unhon ney shabana roz terbiat aur sakht mehnet ka silsila shuru ker dea aur apney kazen Rehmat Khan ki cotching mein aisey khelari baney key sirf 17 sal ki umer mein unhon ney Australia key Jeef HFunt ko shikasht dea ker world open jeet lea
Yahan sey Jahangir Khan ki kamyabeon key silseley ka agaz hua aur moselsel 5 sal tek who na qabil e shishat rahtey huae kamyabeon par kamyabian hasil ker tey gae
unhon ney sarehy panch saw sey zaid moqablon mein mosalsel kamyabi hasil ker key aisa record qaiem kea jisey shaed aenda koi na tor sekey
1982 mein Jhangir Khan ney aik point bhi beggar Inter national Squash plears asosi ashion ki champion ship jeet ker aik dunya ko warta hairet mein dal dea
yehan bhi Jahangir Khan ney apna loha manwaya aur 13 tournaments mein sey 12 mein kamyabi hasil ki
Amrica key saf e aual key khaelari Mark Talboot sey iss dauran inn ka 13 moqabla hua aur inn mein sey 12 mertaba Jahangir Khan ney kabyabi hasil ki
ibtedai moqablon mein Jahangir Khan ko kamyabi hasil hue lakin bad azan Jan Sher Khan ney mosalsel 9 moqablon meinun key khelaf kamyabi hasil ki
Jahangir Khan key khelaf kamyabi ka iss sey behter record aur kisi khelari ka nahin
Retired honey sey pehley unhon ney mosalsel 10 bar yea ejaz hasil kea jo aik record hay
app ki kamyabeon key eteraf mein app ko sadarti temgha barae husn karkerdagi sey nawaza gea aur Canada key aik adarey ney un ki zindagi par ‚ÄúFatha‚Äù nami aik film bhi taiyar ki
iss key elawa almi sitah par unhein bea shumar deegar azazat sey nawaza gea woh kae mertaba almi Squash Fedreation key Sadar bhi muntakhib ho chukey hain
Boom boom Afridi mountains ke shehzade aur cricket ground mein sixers ka badshah‚Ä¶
Jarihana andaaz se khelne wale khiladi to duniya mein beshumar hain, magar Afridi ki baat he kuch aur hai
Kuch log to yahan tak kehte hain ke cricket ki duniya ne in jaise mizaaj ka khiladi na dekha hai aur na shayad aaiynda dekh paaenge
In ke bare mein yeh kehna ke wo jarihana style ke all rounder hain
tahum inhe ab bhi one day international aur twenty twenty ka king kaha ja sakta hai
Agar wo bating mein johar nahi dikha pae to balling mein jadogari dikha dete hain
Isi liye Shahid ko dunioya ke behtareen all rounder ki suff mein shamil kiya jata hai
Shahid Afridi aise batsman hain ke jo khelne ke liye ground mein aate hain to aik samaa band jata hai
Cricketer Shahid Khan Afridi us daur ki paidawar hain, jab Pakistan ne 1992 mein world cup jeeta tha aur har naujawan Imran Khan aur Javed Miandad ki tarah cricketer banna chahta tha
Shahid ki aamad aik toofan sabit hui, kyun ke Nairobi ground par Kenya ke khilaaf 3rd number par bating karte huie in naujawan ne 37 balls par century bana kar aalmi record torh dala tha
Yeh mehdood over ski tez tareen century thi, jise dekhte hue cricket ke paristaron ki oper ki saans oper aur niche ki saans niche reh gai thi
Sari duniya satellite Television ke zariye mebhoot ho kar yeh manzar dekh rahi thi

In ki khidmaat hasil karne ke liye Dhaka franchise ne 7 lac dollars ki peshkash ki,
tahum Shahid Afridi ne apne Watan ke liye khelne ko daulat kamane par tarjeeh di aur England ke khilaaf series ke baiys BPL mein khelne se inkaar kar diya

is film ne Bharat aur Pakistan Samet puri duniya mein both acha business kerny ke saath Sonal Chauhan ke Bollywood ki namwar adakaraon ke suf mein la khara kiya,magar usy dusri adakaran ki trha bary banner ki filmein na milin,us ke baad us ne BUDDHA OGYA TERA BAAP,3G ke alawa Telugu film Rainbow aur Kanda film mein abhi tak kam kiya hai

JANNAT mein meri performance ko dekhty huey telgo flm RAINBOW mili is ke alawa ek kanda film bhi ke

Hindustani art cinemas ke qad aawar artists ki top of the list murattab ki jae to Farooq Sheikh ka naam yaqeeni taur par is mien shamil ho ga
Faooq ne us zamane mien mutawazi cinema mien naam peyda kiya
Yun to is actor ne riwayati commercial films mien bhi salahiyaton ke johar dikhae, magar in ki shanakht art films he rahi
Farooq ki acting mien aik tarah ka thehrao numayan tha
Jo unhe art film ke liye mauzoo banata tha
Phir aik taweel waqfey ke bad 2008 mien inho ne films se dobara nata jorha
Jis ka aiteraf yeh khud bhi karte the
Log mujhe pehchantehain, meri janib dekh kar muskurate hain aur hath bhi hilate hain
Aesi pazeerai na milne ka qalq mujhe kabhi nahi raha
Art films mien acting ke aaghaz par Farooq Sheikh ko Satya Jeet Rai, Muzaffar Ali, Rishikesh Mukherjee aur Ketan Mehta jaise kohna mushq directors ke saath kaam karne ka mauqa mila
In directors ne in ke talent ko nikharne mien aeham role adaa kiya
Magar inho ne khud ko stage aur silver screen he tak mehdood nahi rakha, bal ke Television par bhi apni salahiyaton ka jadoo jagaya
Khate peete khandan se talluq hone ki bina par inhe tamam saholtein hasil rahi

Nasir Iqbal is waqat Pakistan ke un chand khilariyon mein se aik hain jin se mustaqbil mein achi umeeden wabasta hain
Wo Pakistan squash ki tarikh ke wahid khilari hain jinein British Open junior ki under 13 championship jetne ka ezaz hasil hai
Wo duniya squash mein junior satah ke kai muqabalon ke title apne naam kar chuke hain
1st April 1994 ko Bannu mein paida hone wale Pakistan number one Nasir Iqbal apne khandan ke wahid fard hain jo benul qawami satah par Pakistan ki numaindagi kar rahe hain
Unhein England mein hone wale London Open aur Malaysia mein hone wale Royal Cup ka title jeetne ka ezaz bhi hasil hai

Duniya e squash mein 2013 ke ikhtetam par un ki World ranking 48 thi, tahum Nasir Iqbal ke azam buland hain aur bohat jald dunya ke top ten khilariyon mein shamil hone ke leye pori mehnat kar rahe hain
Nasir Iqbal: Main Bannu se squash kheelne wala phela khilari hun,
bas usse dekh kar mera shoq barha aur main is tarah aaga aur teen saal ki practice aur training ke bad main ne British Junior mein shirkat ki aur under 13 championship jeetne mai kaamyab raha
Is tournament mein kaamyabi se mere leye squash kheelne ki rahein khulti gayein, phir bad mein na sirf Pakistan balke beron e mulk mein bhi junior title jeetne mein kaamyab raha hun
Question: Haliya dinon mein benul aqwam satah par aap ki karkardagi nisbatan behtar rahi hai aage kia tawaqoaat hain?
Nasir Iqbal : koshish yehi hoti hia ke mehnat Karen aura chi karkardagi pesh Karen,

har waqat zehan mein yehi baat hoti hai ke jis tarah Jahangir Khan aur Jan Sheer Khan ne Pakistan ka naam roshan kiya hai un ke naqsh e qadam chalen aur squash mein Pakistan ke khoye howae muqam ko aik martaba phir hasil kar len,
lekin is ki wahaj talent ya practice ki kami nahi hai
Allah ka shukar hai ke is ke bawajod main London Open aur us se qabal Malaysia mein hone wale Royal Cup ko jeetne mein kaamyab raha
jahan squash ke almi number aik aur do khilariyon se muqable ache aur kante ke howae the
Khas tor par Girigiri Goltair se bohat close match howae the,
main ab tak top 16 ranking ke khilariyon ko shikast de chukka hun,
sirf moqa milne ki baat hai agar ye musalsal milte rahe to nataij aur behtar hun ge
jab ke aik waqat tha ke jab 35 ya 40 saal tak ke khilari court mein benul qawami squash kheelte nazar aate the,
meri umar is waqat 20 saal hai aur mere pas abhi kafi waqat hai ke main duniya ke bare bare tournaments mein karkardagi pesh karon aur top position hasil karon
Nasir Iqbal: Jahan tak Misr ki baat hai to Misr se taluq rakhne wale khilari kafi ache ja rahe hain, Misr mein junior khilariyon

Junior muqablon mein Misr ke khilari benul aqwami satah par kafi behtar karkardagi ka muzahirah kar rahe hain, is waqat Misr ke benul aqawami satah ke khilari Karim Darwesh aur Amar Shabana junior khilariyon ko training de
halan ke humare khilariyon ko tawatur ke sath bare tournaments mein shirkat ke moqe mile to hum top ten khilariyon ko shikast dene main
apni missal pesh karta hunk e agar beron e mulk hone wale shirkat ke leye mujhe sirf tickets bhi mil jayein to main bohat jald ranking behtar karte howae top ten khilariyon mein aasakta hun

Question : Ghar walon ki taraf se beron e mulk hone wale tournaments mein shirkat ke hawale se kitni support hai?Nasir Iqbal : Is waqat to tamam tar support ghar walon ki taraf se hi hai, won a sirf hum par mehnat kar rahe
hum ne himat nahi hari, hum neek niyati ke sath lage howae hain
humein umeed hai ke halat hameshah kharab nahi rahein ge aura cha waqat zaror aaye ga, kyun ke hum bhi kisi se kam nahi hain

Question : Ese kon se senior khilari hain jin ki ranking behtar hone ke imkanat hain aur wo kam iz kam top 20 mein aasakte hain?Nasir Iqbal : Senior mein is waqat mere sath Farhan Zaman, Danish Atlas, Sheikh Saqib aur Taiya
Main samajhta hunk e khilariyon ko PIA ya mukhtalif banks aur degar idaron mein mulazimat mile to phir squash ka kheel aur tezi se taraqi kare ga

Yeh 28 November 1979 ka waqea hai jab Adleed mein Torsam Khan doosre round ke match mein New Zealand ke Newan Barber ke madd e moqabil they woh tamashayon sey bhari huee galri mein apne fun ka shandar mozahra ker rahe they
Uss waqt un ke teen behtareen dost Hadayat Jahan,Gogi Alauddin, Jaif Hat, un ke qareeb maujood they aur un ki azmat ko salam ker rahe they
16 saal (years) ki umer mein woh pehli mertaba qaumi junior champion bane they aur iss tarah unki shohrat ka silsila shooru hua
1971 mein New Zealand ke daura mein unhon ne Pakistan ki numaen dagi ki 1972 mein unhon ne Western England open jeeti aur issi saal professional serkit mein agae
1973 mein unhon ne teen aham tournament jeete aur apna nam bare khelaryon ki saf mein likhwa leya ane wale saalon mein woh duniya ke top ten khelaryon mein shamil they magar
Wo guzishta dinon Russia mein hone wale World University moqablon mein Pakistan Universities ki numaindagi kar chuki hain
Higher Education unhein un ki athletics ke medan mein outstanding karkardagi par scholar ship se bhi nawaz chukka hai

wo Pakistan athletics ki pheli athlete hain jo quomi satah ke moqablon mein aik event ke doran infaradi tor par 8 gold medals hasil karne ke elawa majmoi tor par 2 darjan se zaid gold medals apne naam kar chukka hain
Wo aik behtareen sprinter aur jumper hain
Un ki shandar karkardagi ke baad ab ye baat yaqini hai ke wo bohat jald Pakistan ki numaindagi karne mein kamyab ho jayein gi

Football World Cup 2014 Brazil mein munaqid ho raha hai aur Brazil bilashubah Football se diwangi ki had tak muhabat karne walon ka mulk hai
Jahan Football dekhna aur kheelna aik abdat ki se ahmiyat rakhta hai
Lehazah tawaqa hai ke teams ke mabeen zabardast marka aarai ho gi
Aaiye kurah e arz ke is aham tareen kheel ke mah e rawan mein hone wale sab se bare almi event ke bare mein jante hain
Mojudah Football World Cup tarteb ke lehaz se beaswan (20th) event hai
Jis ke ineqad ke leye kai mumalik khuwahishmand the
Tahum qura e fal Brazil ke naam nikla
Is elan ke taqreban aik saal bad 17 March 2004 ko South American Football Assosiation ke mutazamin ki janib se elan kiya gaya ke World cup 2014 ke muqable Brazil mein munaqid kiye jayein ge

Is peshraft ke baad 13 December 2006 ‚ÄúBrazilian Football Confederation‚Äù ke us waat ke saddar ‚ÄúRicardo Teixeira‚Äù ne bazabta tor par muqabalon ke ineqad ki hami bharte howae Brazil ko FIFA ke samne bator umeedwar mulk pesh kia
Tahum is doran Colombia ne 18 December 2006 ko elan kiya ke wo bhi muqabalon ke ineqad ke leye bator umeedwar is muqabale mein dakhil ho raha hai

Is tarah taqreban 6 mah ki mushawarat ke bad FIFA ne 30 October 2007 ko elan kiya ke chun ke 20014 ke Football World Cup ke ineqad ki dor mein Brazil ke elawa koi mulk sharik nahi hai, lehaza 2014 ka Almi Cup Brazil mein munaqed kiya jaye ga

Football World Cup 2014 ka mezban mulk mutakhib hone ke bad almi satah par is baat ka wawela kiya gaya ke Brazil iqtesadi tor par is qabil nahi ke wo in muqabalon ke leye almi mayar ke stadiums tameer kar sake
Tahum Brazil kyun ke Football ke dewanon ka mulk hai lehaza isjazbe ko samne rakhte howae Brazilian Football Assosiation ne stadiums ki tameer ke leye din raat aik kar deye

Tahum FIFA ne in sheharon ki tadad ko 10 se 8 tak mehdod karne ka mashwarah diya jis ke jawab mein Brazilian Football Confedrationke us waqat ke Saddar Ricardo  Teixeira ne muqabalon ke leye sheharon ki tadad 12 mutaiyan kar di
31 May 2009 ko muqabalon ke mezban sheharon ka elan karte howae unhon ne waze kiya ke ye wo shehar hain jin ke zarye pore mulk mein Football ke tamashai muqabalon se mehzoz ho saken ge

Guzishta saal December tak naye stadiums ki tameer aur purane medanon ki tazeen o araish  ke leye Brazil Football Assosiation aur Brazilian hukumat ne 3.7 Billion Dollor ke akhrajat ka takhmina lagaya tha
Lekin Brazilian hukumat ne naye stadiums ki tameer aur degar tamirati kaamon ka silsila jari rakha

Stadiums ki tameer ke elawa sarkon ki tameer, Tram service, Railway line, Airports aur degar tamirati kaamon ke akhrajat ke leye mashhor maliyati adare Bloomberg ne World cup ke doran majmoi tor par 14
Is ke bawajod World Cup par ane wale akhrajat aur stadiums ki tameer ke leye rihaishi elaqon ko khali karane par Brazil ke bare sheharon mein zabardast muzahire kiye gaye aur ye silsila jari hai

Waise to sab se ache talluqaat hain
Lekin bhai aur biwi mere qareebi dost hain
Yeh bohat zarori hai ke agar biwi ko apna dost samajh kar us se har achi buri baat share ki jaey, to aitemad barhega aur wo bhi apne aap ko aeham samjhegi
Agar use kisi third person se koi baat maloom hui to use is liye aehmiyat nahi degi kyun ke wo pehle se is ke barey mein janti hai
Lehaza hum biwi ko apna dost aur raazdar banae rakhen to sab se ziyada faiyda hum he ko ho ga aur ghar ka mahaul bhi pur sukoon rahega
Waldah ne jawani hi mein apni zindagi falahi kaamon mein waqf kardene ka ahad kar liya tha
Film flop ho gai tahum Cannes Film Festival mein ese kafi saraha gaya
Katrina ne mayos ho kar Telugu filmon ka rukh kiya lekin behtar talafuz ke sath Urdu sekhne ki koshishen bhi shuru kar dein
Telugu mein unhon ne apni pheli film "Malliswari" ke leye 75 lac moawza wasol kiya jo us dor mein south ki kisi bhi filmi heroin ke leye bohat bhari moawza tha
2009 mein "New York" ki release ke bad un ki adakarana salahiyaton ko bhi taslem kar liya gaya
Is film ke leye wo Film Fare Awrad ki behtareen adakara ke leye bhi namzad hoien

Film "Mere baradar ki dulhan" mein agarcha Katrina Kaif ke sath Imran Khan aur Ali Zafar donon hi ne kaam kiya lekin Ali Zafar Katrina ke sath ziyadah jache aur film ki promotion ke doran Katrina, Ali Zafar ki tarifon mein zameen asman ke qalabe milati rahen
Beharhaal pechle dinon un ke Ranbir Kapoor se zordar mashqe ki khabren garam thein aur shadi ke imkanat bhi zahir kiye jarahe the
Salman Khan un ka phela phela piyar hain
Abid Ali ko Pakistani tv screen ke golden dor ka numaindah adakar kaha jata hai
Apni bhar pur awaz, mardana  wajahat aur purtasur chehre ke bais wo pheli hi nazar mein nazreen ko bha gaye
Is ke bad unhon ne kamyab dramon ko aik qatar laga di balke ye kehna behtar ho ga ke aik zamane mein Abid Ali ki mojudgi kisi bhi drama ki kamyabi ki zamin samjhi jane lagi thi
Atta Shad ne Abid Ali mein chupe here ko bhanp liya aur un ki awaz ki tarifon ke pul bandhte howe unhen radio par kaam karne ki dawat di

Lahore mein tv ki chamak aur glamour ki chakachond ne is nojawan ko apni bahon mein leya aur raaton raat shorat ki bulandiyan te karte howe Abid Ali tv ke mashhor fankaron ki fehrist mein shamil ho gaye
Lekin tv par dakhla unhen kisi chor darwaze ya achanak chance ke zariye nahi balke mutadid bar audition ke marahil se guzarne aur apne intekhab ki merit sabit karne ke bad hi mila
Is ke elawa bhi unhon ne tv ke sath sath Pakistani filmon mein apni adakari ke johar dikhaye
Fan e adakari ke shobe mein Abid Ali ko aik legend ki hesiyat hasil hai
Wo guzarte waqat ke sath apni adakari mein tano paida karne ke mahir hain
Chunacha unhon ne Hollywood ke adakaron ki rah par chalte howe character acting par tawaja di aur chotte kirdaron ko bhi apni jandar performance se bara bana kar dikha diya
Abid Ali Pakistan ke wo fankar hain jinhon ne pichle 40 salon mein betakan kaam kiya aur adakaron ki 3 naslon ke sath na sirf adakari ki balke nazreen ki 3 naslon ko apne fan se mehzoz bhi kiya
Wo aaj bhi kisi drame ke set par hon to nihayat inkasari aur piyar ke sath apne juniors ko apna fan aik ustad ki tarha muntaqil kar rahe hote hain
Wo dheme lehje mein goftogo karne wale aik khush shakal, khush libas aur khush goftar fankar hain
Sirf kaam se kaam rakhna un ka style  aur sab se dosti rakhna un ka mizaj hai
Wo apne tabnak mazi se jure rehne ke bawajod jadid dor ke taqazon se bhi khud ko humahang rakhe howe hain
Amoman log samajhte hain ke jhok siyal hi Abid Ali ki pheli serial thi halan ke sach ye hai ke unhon ne sab se phele Saleem Chishtti le likhe howe kheel "zanjeer" mein adakari ki
Unhon ne aik ese dor mein shohrat hasil ki jab tv par aana aur adakari karna nihayat mushkil kaam tasawor hota tha
Muqabla sakht tha aur bare bare adakaron ki aik lambi qatar phele hi apna naam bana chuki thi

Rohi Bano, Khaldah Riyasat aur Uzma Gillani ke muqable markazi kirdar milna koi asan baat nahi thi magar Abid Ali ne jald hi sabit kar diya ke Abid Ali bhi aik naam hai jis ke sath kaam karna bhi kisi kam azaz ki baat nahi
1985 mein hukumat e Pakistan ne un ki ala fani khidmaat ke atiraf mein unhen Pride of Performance ke award se nawaza

Jhoke Sial ko Abid Ali ke hawale se is leye bhi yadgar serial qarar diya jata hai ke awal to us ke zariye unhon ne apni shanakht banai, phir isi serial mein apne sath kaam karne wali Humeira Chudhry ko apna jewan sathi bhi bana liya jin se Abid Ali ki 3 betiyan hain aur teenon hi in dinon showbiz mein ala muqam par hain
Khud mukhtari muyassar aai to modeling ki duniya mein qadam rakha
Is yaksaniyat se picha churane ke liye inho ne baqaida Actors Studio mein acting ki taleem o tarbiyat hasil kli
Jis ke bad film Bus Stop mein in ki dramatic acting ko naqadon ne bohat saraha aur Marilyn golden globe award ke liye nominate hui

Marilyn ki zindagi ke kae saal dard, mehromiyon aur tarah tarah ke nashaib o faraz se ibarat hain aur in ke interviews ya sawanah hayat mein in ka zikar aata raha hai, is liye sex symbol kehlane ke bawajood logon ke dilon mein in ke liye aik khaas qisam ki hamdardi bhi maujood rahi, jis mein aihteraam ki aamezish thi
1952 mein base ball ke player Joe DiMaggio se Marilyn Monroe ke romance ke bohat charche rahe
14 January 1954 ko Marilyn Monroe ne in se shadi kar li aur honey moon Japan mein guzara
Marilyn Monroe apne shohar ke business mein bhi hath batati rahi
Joe DiMaggio se bhi divorce ho gai, lekin Maggio ne wafa ka rishta Marilyn Monroe ke inteqal ke bad bhi barqarar rakha aur 20 years tak wo week mein 3 martaba Marilyn ki qabar par rose rakhwate rahe
Wo apni bazla sanji, hazir jawabi, aur dilchasp jumlon ki badaulat kisi bhi function mein jaan daal deti hain
Ab inhe aik aur aezaaz hasil hua hai
Is cook ne steven ki harkaat mein gher mamoli phurti dekhte hue steven ko martial art ki bunyadi technique sikhai
Jis ke bad Steven Seagal ne martial art ki qisam Aikido ki baqaida taleem lena shuru kar di
Steven bhi apne walid ke sath Japan chale gaey aur wahin par martial art ki training lete rahe
Yahan tak ke steven ne 1 se 7 grade tak ki black belt  hasil kar li
Inhe white leather ka Bruce Lee kaha ja sakta hai
Jin ke sath steven aik bar phir Japan aa gae aur in dono ne shadi kar li

Jo box office par hit sabit hui

Ustad Bare Ghulam Ali Khan ne mosiqi ke tamam raz Master Inayat Hussain par wa kar deye aur un ki khososi tawajah ne Master Inayat Hussain mein ese roshni paida ki jis ka izhar unhon ne apni filmi mosiqi mein is tarah kiya ke un ke banaye howae geet amar ho gaye aur aaj bhi sune walon ke kanon mein ras gholte hain
Mumbai aur Kolkata ke mukhtalif theateron mein kaam kiya aur neem classical gaiki mein un ka naam bare ehtaran se leya jane laga
Master Inayat Hussain ne in gramophone companies mein nihayat umdah aur arfa kaam kiya
Aaj jab ke nifs sadi se ziyadah arsa ho chukka hai,hawwa e nobahar ki tarah is ke subuk jhunke mashor kun hain

Malka e mosiqi Roshan Aara Begum ki gai hoi thumri ho ya dadra, ya phir Malka e Phukhraj jesi sahib e aslob maghniya ki gai hoi ghazal, Master Inayat Hussain ne har sif e mosiqi aur har fankar ke sath pora pora insaf kiya
Apni uhad ke nihayat pur soz aur surile golokara Zenat Begum ke gale se ese ese Urdu aur Punjabi geet gawaye jis ki missal milna mushkail hai
Master Inayat Hussain ne gramophone company ke sath taqreban 9 baras kaam kiya, is ke bad 1946 mein un ko aik Punjabi film ‚Äúkamli‚Äù mili jo Lahore hi mein taiyar hoi
Is film mein Master Inayat Hussain ne Ustad Barkat Ali Khan se bhi geet gawaya tha
Qayam e Pakistan ke baad un ki pheli film ‚Äúhichkole‚Äù thijo 1949 mein numaish ke leye pesh hoi
Is ki wajah ye thi ke wo dheme mizaj ke insan the aur kaam apni lagan se karte the
dosri aik wajah ye bhi thi ke wo ziyadah tar nagme ragon mein banate the jis ke leye waqat aur mehnat darker hote hain

Yehi wajah hai ke film ‚Äúanar kali‚Äù mein Anwar Kamal Pasha ki jald bazi ki wajah se Master Inayat Hussain ne teen nagme compose karne ke bad Anwar Kamal Pasha ko jawab de deya kyun ke wo kaam jaldi chahate the aur Master Inayat Hussain apni tabyat ke mutabiq kaam karna chahate the

Un ki tarteb di hoi mosiqi mein film ‚Äúgum naam‚Äù mein Iqbal Bano ka gaya howa geet ‚Äúpayal mein geet hain cham cham ke‚Äù na sirf zaban e zad e aam howa balke Iqbal Bano ko bhi shuhrat ki bulandion par le gaya
Bol the ‚Äúulfat ki nai manzil ko chala‚Äù is gane ne bhi us dor mein tehalka macha deyaaur zaban e zad o aam howa
Film ‚Äúishq par zor nahi‚Äù ka ye geet sun kar bhi log jhoom uthte hain ‚Äúdil deta ro ro duhai kisi se koi payar na kare
Ye film box office par super hit thi
Is ki mosiqi itni lajawab thi ke Mala Begum ki pehchan ban gai
Is film mein Mala begum ne itne khubsorat geet gaye ke aaj bhi logon ko bhale lagte hain
Master Inayat Hussain ke 1949 se 1965 tak ke dor ko aap aik sunehri dork eh sakte hain
Jis mein unhon ne khubsorat naghmat takhliq kiye
Koi geet ya ghazal rag Malkonas, Malhar, pahari aur Je je winti mein hai, kahein Bheron hai to kisi mein Darbari ka teez aahang hai aur ye turra e imtiaz sirf Master Inayat Hussain ka hai
Aap tamam golokaron se mehnat karwate the is leye un ko mushkil mosikar bhi kaha jata tha
Is doran bhi khubsorat kaam kiya
Is dor mein un ki shuhra e afaq film ‚Äúmola jaat‚Äù bhi shamil hai jis ne Pakistan ki tarikh mein record business kiya aur sab se ziyadah cinema haalon mein numaish pazeer rahi

Master Inayat Hussain ne ghair filmi ghazalen aur geet bhi compose kiye jin mein Inayat Hussain Bhatti, Munawar Sultana, Malka e Pukhraj,Dilshad Begum aur Malka e mosiqi Roshan Aara Begum ne awaza ka jadu jagaya
Inhe agar husun ka majmooa kaha jae to be jana ho ga, kyun ke aisa lagta hai ke qudrat ne tamam tar khobiyan in ke paikar mein yakja kardi hain

Attaullah Esakhelvi has been sung forty thousand songs in seven languages of Pakistan
In this page you can see the biography of Ataullah Esakhelvi
Ataullah Niazi ne 19 August 1951 ko Mianwali ke village Esakhel ke aik sadah aur mazhabi gharane mein janam liya
Inho ne ibtedai taleem maqami school aur deeni madarsey se hasil ki, jo khandan aur mahaul ki riwayat thi, lekin in ki riwayat shikan soch aur khayalaat inhe muztarib rakhte
Mehnat mazdoori hotel mein nokri, truck driving, gharz zinda rehne ke liye inho ne kya kuch nahi kiya
Gardish ayyam inhe Faisalabad le gai, jahan wo auto rickshaw chalate rahe
Parhe likhe log jinhe gaeyki aur mauseeqi se shinasaai ka zaaym tha
Yeh in ki pehli shadi thi, jis se in ka aik beta bhi hai
In ki dosri shadi apne daur ki famous qalmi actress Bazgha se hui, jin se in ke 2 bache beta Sanwal aur beti Laraib hain
In dono bachon ki paidaish London mein he hui
Laraib ki shadi bhi aik Pakistani ladke se London mein he hui, jab ke Sanwal singing ka shauq rakhte hain
Islamabad mein derina dost Yasir Noman, jinho ne lok virsa mein un ki sab se ziyada recording ki, mohabbat se Lala ( Barha Bhai ) pukarte the
Wo Pakistan ki 7 languages mein ab tak 40,000 songs gaa chuke hain
Bushra Ansari is a Pakistani drama actress, presenter, host, comedian, singer and play writer also
She married with She started her career as a child star in children music show ‚Äú Kalbon Ki Mala ‚Äù from PTV channel
First time Bushra Ansari performed in the Iqbal Ansari‚Äôs drama, and then she participated in the different shows and dramas of PTV channel
She played a nurse role in ‚ÄúEmergency Ward‚Äù drama
Bushra Ansari well known from the Anwar Maqsood‚Äôs drama ‚ÄúShosha‚Äù as a role of Bijli

Bushra Ansari performed in well known dramas like, Neeli Dhoop, Kuch Dil Ne Kaha, Makaan, Fifty Fifty, Dolly Ki Aaegi Baraat, Annie Ki Aaegi Baraat, Mera Naseeb, Bilqees Kaur, Mere Dard ko Jo Zuban Mile etc
Now she is working in the Pakistan Idol as a judge with Hadiqa Kiyani and Ali Azmat from Geo TV
In this page, you can see  Bushra Ansari biography in Urdr
Bushra Ansari ki sakhsiyat ke kae roop hain
Bushra Ansari ne aik child performer ke taur par apna career shuru kiya aur guzishta 4 dihaiyon se television screen par mukhtalif andaaz mein apne fun ka jadoo jaga rahi hain
is mein koi shak nahi ke wo khudadad salahiyaton ki malik hain, lekin yeh credit bhi unhi ko jata hai ke inho ne un salahiyaton ko behtar tariqey se istemal kar ke wo maqam hasil kar liya hai
Early life : Bushra Ansari namwar adeeb aur sahafi Ahmed bashir ki beti hain
Lady griffin school Lahore se taleem mukammal karne ke bad Lahore college for Women se Intermediate kiya
Jab ke BA ki degree Waqarunnisa college for Women se hasil ki
Bushra Ansari ki shadi 1978 mein Tv producer Iqbal Ansari se hui
Jab wo apne parents ke sath Islamabad muntaqil hui
Yeh aik kat putli show tha, jis ke kirdar Uncle Sargam, Heega aur Masi Musibtey aaj bhi logon ke zehno mein zinda hain
Bushra ne is show mein sharmeeli ke character ke liye apni awaz record karwai thi
Is ke bad wo PTV ke mukhtalif shows aur dramas mein baqaiydgi se hissa lene lagein
Emergency ward mein inho ne aik nurse ka role nibhaya
Is show mein Bushra Ansari ne Shakeel ki larhaka biwi ka role kiya tha
Bushra Ansari ne na sirf mazahiya role he nahi bal ke sanjeeda acting mein bhi apni salahiyat ka bharpor muzahira kiya
Neeli Dhoop, Makaan, Kuch Dil Ne Kaha aur deegar dramas mein in ki acting dekhne se talluq rakhti hai

Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto Pakistan kay pehlay muntakhab Wazir-e-Azam aur siasat ko drawing room say nikal kar awam mein lanay walay pehlay Pakistani rahnuma 5 January 1927 ko Sir Shahnawaz Bhutto kay han Al Murtaza  Larkana Sindh mein  paida huye.
Sir Shahnawaz Bhutto namwar siasatdan aur tehreek-e-Pakistan kay markazi rehnumaon mein say aik thay aur Bar-e-Saghir Pak o Hind mein Sindh aur Bombay ki saisat kay markazi satoon manay jatay thay.
Bhutto khandan Sindh anay say qabal zila Hisar kay aham qasba Sarsa kay aik gaon Mozu Bhutto mein abad tha aur isi monasbat say usey Bhutto kaha jata hai.
Yeh gaon ab bhi sarsawati kay kinaray abad hai. Sarsa aik aham railway station bhi tha.
Sikhon kay zamanay mein jab dariya saraswati khushk ho gia aur
iss khandan kay afrad Sindh ki taraaf hijrat kerkay Larkana mein moqeem ho gaye.
aur Pakistani tareekh per app nay itnay gehray asrat morattab keyeh kay inka ahatah karna kai jildon ka matqazi hay.

Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto nay Bishop High School Karachi sa ibtadai taleem hasil ki aur Cathedral High School Bombay say December 1946 mein Senior Cambridge ka imtahan pass kia September 1947 mein unhain America mein Los Angles ki junubi California University mein dakil karwadia gaya 1950 mein unho nay siasiat mein BA owners kiya.
Iss kay bad unhon nay Christ Church College Oxford University mein dakhla lia jahan say  1952 mein unhon ney MA owners ki dirge hasil ki.
Taleem say farig hokar woh 1953 mein Pakistan lautay aur amli zindagi ka aaghaz kia.
Woh Sindh Muslim Law College mein juz waqti professor rahay aur wakalat bhi ki
Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto  dar asal amli siasat mein hissah lanay kay khahan thay

Chunanchay  unhon nay Iskander Mirza ki shafarish per Zulfiqar Ali Bhutu ko apni cabina mein shamil kar lia aur Commerce Ministry un kay hissay mein aie

Yeh 2 martaba Russia ke president aur aik martaba prime minister ban chuke hain.
Putin Russia sarbarah mumlikat banne wale sab se kam umer shakhs hain, inho ne yeh aezaaz sirf 48 baras ki umer mein hasil kiya.
Inhe zehni aur jismani har 2 lihaaz se aik sakhtgeer leader samjha jata hai.
Mauqir American jareede ‚Äú Time Magazine ‚Äù ne Putin ki qaidana salahiyaton ka aiteraf karte hue inhe 2007 ka Person of the year yani 2007 ki aeham tareen shakhsiyat qaraar diya hai.
Vladimir Putin ne 7 October 1952 ko sabqa soviet union ke shehar Lennon Grad ke aik ghareeb Russian Orthodox Christian family mein janam liya.

Putin ko detective films se dili shaggaf tha aur inhe se mutassir ho kar inho ne qanoondaan ke bajae suragh risa‚Äôan banne ka faisla kiya aur soviet khufiya agency ‚Äú KGB ‚Äù mein shamoliyat ikhteyar kar li.
26 March 2000 ko Vladimir Putin ko Russia ka naya sarbarah mumlikat muntakhib kar liya gaya.

Vladimir Putin 2 martaba sadar muntakhib ho chuke hain aur in ki meyaad March 2008 mein khatam ho rahi thi lekin tab bhi in ka yehi kehna tha ke Russia ki taraqqi ke liye maujoda policies ka tasalsul aur khud in ka iqtedar mein rehna zarori hai.

Pakistan ki mashor mosawira Anna Molka Ahmed 13 August 1917 ko Landon mein paida hoein.
Anna Molka ki waldah ka taluq Poland aur walid ka Russia se tha.

3 December 1939 ko Anna Molka ki shadi Sheikh Ahmed se hoi jo khud bhi artist the.

Punjab University Lahore ki taraf se art teacher ke tor par muntakhib keye jane ke baad Anna Molka Ahmed apne shohar ke hamrah Amritsar se Lahore chali geinaur apne career ka baqaidah aghaz kiya.
Ye shuba ibteda mein sirf talbat ke leye makhsos tha lekin 1956 mein larko ko bhi dakhle ki ijazat de di gai.
Aap ne 1971 ki jung ke doran Pakistani fojion ki shujaat aur bhaduri ke waqeyat ko apne fanparon ke zarye numayan kiya.
Aap ki ye tasawir war museum mein mujod hain.

Bilquis Edhi ka shumar ese h afrad mein kiya ja sakta hai.
Is baat ka ishara un ki tarikh e peaidaish se bhi milta hai jo 14th August 1947 hai yani aan qayam e Pakistan ke roz.
Is kaam mein un ki betiyan bhi sath deti hain.

Helen Keller 1880 mein American riyasta Alabama ke aik qasbe mein paida hoein.
Phir us ne apni gurya aur habshi bawarchi ki beti ke sath khelna shuru kiya.
Unho ne aik jagah parha ke kisi shakhs ne aik behri aur andhi aurat ko parhna likhna sikhaya tha.
Mukhtalif jagah dar badar ho kar us ki waldah telephone ke mujid doctor Graham Bell se milein aur unhon ne unhen special bachon ki ustani Miss Eon Miens Field Salon tak pohancha diya.
Miss Salon ne Helen Keller ke hath par alfaz likh likh kar ehsasat ke zarye ese horf e tahaji se mutarif karaya.
Helen Keller ke hath mein gurya pakra kar wo us ke hath par gurya ke horf e tahaji likhti.
Helen Keller ki taleem ka dosra dor us waqat shuru howa jab us ki ustad ne brills par chapi hoi kitabein mangwaein.
Jese ji use parhna likhna agaya wo khud khatot likhne lagi.
Jab khud us ke pas koi khat aata to wo apni unglion se sotor ka matlab nikalti.
Jab Helen Keller ki umar 8 saal ki hoi to Miss Salon ne te kiya ke ab wo waqat aagaya hai ke wo dosre bachon se mile.
Chunacha wo use Boston Perkins Institute tuition le gai.
Wo hamesha har khat ka jawab deti.
Shehar ki nisbat Helen ko dehat ka muhol ziyadah pasand tha.
Wo fitrat ko nihayat qareeb se dekhna pasand karti thi.
Helen Keller ne 88 saal ki taweel umar pai aur 1968 mein us ka inteqal howa.

1969 mein naye family laws ordinance agaye in laws ki wajah se mujhe aur degar dosri khawateen ko mazid rahein milein kyun ke logon ki uamomi soch ye ban rahi thi ke in laws ko khawateen hi deals karein.
1964 aur 1965 mein, main ne qawanin ke bare mein akhbarat mein likhna shuru kar deya.
Is silsile ko bari baqaidgi se main ne 1971 tak chalaya.

Besween sadi (20th century) mein insaniyat ki khidmat ke leye zindagi waqf kae dene wale afrad aur idaron mein aik numaya tareen naam Mother Teresa aur un ke qaim kardah idare ka hai.
Mother Teresa ka haqiqi naam Acnes Gonzaga Bojaziu tha.
Mother Teresa 26 August 1910 mein Maqdonia ke qazbe Skopje mein paida hoein.
Mother Teresa ke walden Albania se taluq rakhte the.
Skopje us waqat Usmania saltanat ka aik hissa tha. Aaj kale se Maqdonia ke dar ul hukumat ki hesiyat hasil hai.
Mother Teresa mazhaban Roman Catholic Esai thein.
18 saal ki umar mein unhon ne mazhabi jazbe ke zere asar Ireland ke mazhabi idare order of the sisters of aur lady of Loreto mein dakhla le leya.
Mother Teresa ne mazhabi tarbiyat Ireland ke shehar Dublin aur India ke shehar Dar jeeling mein hasil ki.
Kolkata mein Roman Catholic High School ke tehat kaam karte howae Mother Teresa ko wahan rehne walon ka qareeb se mushahidah karne ka moqa mila.

Mother Teresa ke idare ka hissa banne wale logon ko char (4) ehad karna parte the gharibana tarz e zindagi, farman bardari aur tajrad ke bunyadi uhadon ke elawa chotha ehad ye karna parta tha ke wo apni sari zidagi gharibon ki khidmat ke leye waqf kar dein ge.
Mother Teresa ki khidmat ke eteraf mein unhein 1979 mein aman ke Noble Inaam se nawaza gaya.
Isi saal Mother Teresa ka inteqal ho gaya.
Lady Diana 1st July 1961 ko paida hoein aur 31 August 1997 ko sirf 36 saal ki umar mein is duniya se rukhrat hoein ke unginat log ashkbar ho gaye.
Lady Diana ka silsila e nasab bhi shahi khandan se ja milta hai, Lady Diana ke khandan aur bartaniya ke hukumran khandan ka bahimi taluq kam o besh 100 saal porana tha.
Princes Charles se Lady Diana ki shadi ke zarye goya in khandanon ke bahimi taluq ko mazbot tar banane ki koshish ki gait hi.
us waqat duniya bhar mein aaj ki tarah TV channels ki bohtat nahi thi.
Is ke bawajod shadi ki is taqreeb ko duniya bhar mein kam o besh sareh sath (7.5) lakh afrad ne dekha.
Princes Charles se mangni ke elan ke sath hi Shahzadi Diana duniya bhar ke logon ki tawajah ka markaz ban gai thein.
Kaha ye gaya tha ke Papa Razi aik photographer us waqat un ka taqub kar rahe the jab wo apne dost Dodi Alfaid ke sath hotel se nikal kar gari mein ja rahi thein.

Na jane ye itefaq tha ya Lady Diana ki kisi dili khuwahish ka aks ke donon hi mard musalman the (aik Dodi Alfaid aur dosre Pakistani nasrad doctor Hasnat) magar in mein se kisi aik ke sath bhi shadi ke kuwab ko tabir na mil saki aur wo aik hangama khez magar tashna si zindagi guzar kar Dodi Al fayed ke sath 31 August 1997 ko car ke khufnak hadse mien halak ho gaein.
2013 mein Edhi foundation ki janib se 6595 lawaris dead bodies ko ghusal o kafan diya gaya aur 1665 lawaris dead bodies ki tadfeen ki gai.
Karachi information bureau ki janib se Pakistan ke 335 Edhi welfare centers aur 17 Edhi homes ki karkardgi report jari kar di gai hai.

Jis ke mutabiq 1 January se 31 December 2013 tak Pakistan ke tama Edhi welfare centers ki janib se majmooi taur par police ke zariye milne wali 6595 dead bodies ko ghusal aur kafan de kar muft tadfeen ki gai.
Jab ke sirf Karachi mein guzishta 1 saal ke dauran 1665 lawaris dead bodies ki tadfeen ki gai.
Ausatan 1 lawaris dead body ko kafan de kar dafan karne par 8500 rupey ke akhrajat aaey aur aik saal mein is madd par 56057500 rupees ( 5 crore 60 lakh 57 hazar 500 ) rupees ke akhrajaat aaey.
Jin mein Karachi mein 3220, Multan 460, Lahore 691, Islamabad 202395, Peshawar 101, Quetta mei 32 shamil hain.
Guzishta saal ki ba nisbat 2013 mein panah lene wali ladkiyon aur aurton ki tadad mein 50% izafa hua hai.

Guzishta 1 saal ke dauran Khyber Pakhtunkhuwan, Baluchistan ke mukhtalif shehron aur Karachi, Punjab mein majmooi taur par 569 chote barhe bomb blast aur khudkash hamley hue, jis mein 1649 halaak aur 4041 zakhmi hue.
Karachi mein 45 bomb blast hue, jis mein 185 afraad halaak aur 762 afraad zakhmi hue aur Sukkhur bomb blast mein 6 afraad halaak aur 42 zakhmi hue.
Khyber Pakhtunkhuwan ke shehron Peshawar, Hango, Kohat, mein majmooi taur par 477 bomb blast hue.
Jis mein 800 afraad halaak aur 2240 zakhmi hue.
Baluchistan mein Quetta aur deegar shehron mein 45 bomb blast, khudkash hamlon, target killing ke waqeyaat mein 658 afraad halaak aur 997 afraad zakhmi hue.
1 January se 31 December 2013 mein guzishta aik saal ke dauran target killing, gang war, police muqablon mein 2695 afraad halaak aur 3194 afraad zakhmi hue.
Jab ke sab se ziyada halakatein May ke month mein hui.
Jis mein 273 afraad halaak aur 335 zakhmi hue.
Karachi mein 1 saal mein chote barhe 45 bombblast hue.
Jis mein 185 afraad halaak aur 678 zakhmi hue, jab ke sab se ziyada halakatein April mein hui.
Jis mein 57 afraad halaak aur 101 zakhmi hue.
Khudkashi ki wardaton mein 85 afraad be khudkashi ki.
Karachi mein mukhtalif wardaton jis mein current lage, train se cutne, chat se girne, zehrile sharab peene aur khane, churriyon ki waar aur khudkashi se 396 afraad halaak aur 591 afraad zakhmi hue.
Karachi mein chpte barhe accidents mein guzishta 1 saal ke dauran 644 afraad halaak aur 7461 zakhmi hue.
Jab ke accidents ke sab se ziyada waqeyat August ke month mein hue.
Jis mein 99 afraad halaak aur 865 zakhmi hue.

Guzishta saal ke dauran Karachi mein foot paths se milne wale aur logon ki janib se dakhil karwae jane wale 842 lawaris zehni mareez mardon aur 625 zehni mareez aurton ko Edhi village aur Edhi North Karachi centers barae zehni mareezon khuwateen ko Edhi ambulances ke zariye utha kar dakhil kiya gaya.
Edhi child homes Korangi mein gumshuda 160 bachen aur mukhtalif shehron se bhag kar aane wale 180 bachon ko dakhil kiya gaya aur 255 ko virsa ke hawale kiya gaya.
Guzishta saal Karachi mein Edhi ambulances ke zariye 310250 ( 3 lakh 10 hazar 250 ) mareezon aur mayyaton ko gharon se hospital ya hospital se gharon ke liye riyati bunyad par services farahum ki.
Jab ke is saal mareez muntaqli service mein 25 % izafa hua.
Manshiyat ke aadi afraad ka ilaajgah Sohrabh goth ke ward jahan 200 manshiyat ke aadi afraad ko rokne ki gunjaiysh hai.
Is saal 352 manshiyat ke aadi afraad ka ilaaj kiya gaya.
Edhi free maternity home, Meetha dar aur Moosa lane mein guzishta aik saal mein majmoii taur par bila muaawza normal delike 7306 cases kiye gaey.
Jab ke Bilquis Edhi maternity home mein bila muaawaza operation ke zariye delike 1022 cases kiye gaey.
Wazeh rahe deliper operation fee case kam az kam 15000 rupees ke akhrajat aate hain.
Edhi free specialist clinic Moosa lane mein INT skin sugar aur bachon ke mahir Doctors ki janib se 57703 mareezon ka ilaaj kiya gaya.
Edhi free laboratories Moosa lane 3210 mareezon ke muft aur 18500 mareezon ke riwayati bunyad par test kiye gaey.
Edhi animal hospital Super Highway mein Karachi ke mukhtalif telephone aane par 65 mazoor kutton, 88 billiyon, 4 mazoor aur bemar gadhon ko dakhil karne ke bad in ka ilaaj kiya gaya.
Edhi ammonization center Meetha dar aur Moosa Lane mein 4520 bachon ko polio ke drops ke ilawa mukhtalif bemariyon se bachon ke hifazati injections lagaey gaey.
Guzishta saal Baluchistan ke zilaa Awaran mein aane wale shaded zalzale mein 472 shadid zakhmiyon aur Edhi ambulances ke zariye civil, Jinnah aur liyari general hospitals laya gaya.
Aur ilaaj ke bad bila muaawza wapis pohnchaya gaya. Faisal Edhi ki janib se ilaaj ke liye 20000 rupees fee case mareez diye gaey.
12000 khandano mein khushk rashan jis mein aata, chawal, daal, oil ked abbey, cheeni, dry milk, ke ilawa blanket, 200 tent, garam kaprhe taqseem kiye gaey.

Guzishta saal ke dauran Karachi aur androon e sindh mein aag lagne, barish aur seylab se mutasira hone wale 3925 khandano mein paka hua khana, khushk rashan, kaprhe aur gharelo istemal ke bartan taqseem kiye gaey.

1 January ta 31 December 2013 ke dauran Edhi behri khidmat ki janib se Karachi ke sahil ke qareeb doobne wali 3 kashtiyon ke 92 musafiron ko zinda nikaal kar mehfooz maqamaat tak pohnchaya gaya aur samander mein doobne wali 28 dead bodies ko nikala gaya.

Edhi Free cancer hospital Tariq road mein cancer ke 918 mareezon ka ilaaj kiya gaya.

Pakistan mein Islamabad, Lahore, Faislabad, Multan, Karachi ke Edhi fress consultant dispensaries mein majmoo taur par 332158 mareezon aur mayyaton ko riyati bunyad par beyron mulk Karchi Pakistan ke deegar shehron ke liye 31130 mareezon aur mayyaton ko ambulance service di gai.

Jab ke guzishta aik saal ke dauran 335 Edhi welfare centers aur 1800 Edhi ambulances ke fleet ke zariye 1403750 mareezon aur mayyaton ke liye androon e shehar aur 40163 mareezon aur mayyaton ke liye beyron e shehar riyati bunyadon par ambulance service farahum ki gai.

1 January ta 31 December 2013 ke dauran Karachi, Islamabad, Lahore, Multan, Faislabad, Quetta, Hyderabad ke ilawa deegar shehron aur highways par hone wale 6688 chote barhe hadsaat mein 1728 halaak hone walon aur 16571 zakhmiyon ko Edhi ambulance ke zariye bila muaawza qareebi hospitals tak pohnchaya gaya.

2013 mein Karachi ke Edhi free langar, Islamabad, Rawalpindi, Lahore, Faislabad, Multan aur Thatta ke Bilquis Edhi free langar mein majmooi taur par 629008 bhokon ko aik waqt ka khana farahum kiya gaya.
Guzishta saal ke dauran bashamool Karachi ke Pakistan ke tamam Edhi welfare centers ki janib se mamooli deposits par mareezon ke use ki chezen farahum ki gai.
Abdul Sattar Edhi 1928 mein Bharat ki riyasat Gujrat kay shehar Bantawa mein paida huye.
In ki wife mohtarma Bilquis Edhi Foundation ki sarbarah hain.
Abdul Sattar Edhi ka walid kapray kay tajir thay aur motawasit tabqon say taluq rakhtay thay.
1947 mein Taqseem-e-Hind kay baad in ka khandan Bharat say hijrat kar kay Pakistan aya aur karachi mein abad huwa.
1951 mein app nay apni jama poungi say aik choti si dokan khareedi aur issi dokan mein app nay aik doctor ki madad say choti si dispensary khuli jinhone in ko tibi imdad ki mubadiyat sikhaye.
Edhi Foundation Pakistan 1957 mein Karachi mein bohot bare pemane per flow ki wabah phali jis per Edhi sahab nay fouri tour per rade ammal kiya.
Ajj Edhi foundation kay pass 600 say zada ambulance hain jo mulk kay tool o arz mein pheli hoi hain.

Hospital aur ambulance khidmaat kay alawa Edhi foundation nay clinic zachgi ghar pagal khana mazoro kay liye ghar blood bank yateem khane lawaris bacho ko goud lene kay marakaz panha hain aur school khule hai is kay elawa ye foundation nursing aur ghardari kay cource bhi karwati hain.

Janab Altaf Hussain ki family pahlay Karachi mein   Jahangir Road kay sarkari coater mein rahtay thay
1970 ki dehaye mein Altaf Hussain ki family Faderal B Area Block- 8 mein Azizabad ke aik makan mein muntaqil hogaya
120 gaz ka ghar na sirf Altaf Hussain ki rehayish gah balkay siasi sar garmiyoon ka markaz bhi hai
Is ghar ko Pakistan ki siasat mein aik aa'la makam hasil hai jisay hurf-e-aam mein  90 kay nam say duniya janti hai
Altaf Hussain nay 1969 mein Government Boys Secondary School Jail road say Matric pass keya
1970 mein app city college mein inter science kay talib ilm thay
Jis kay tehat har Matric pass noujawan ko aik saal tak lazmi tour par fouji khidmat anjam daina thein
Chunanchay Altaf Hussain bhi iss iskeem kay leye muntakhib huye
Dauran jang hi national cadet service iskeem kay tamam cadetton ko 57 Baloch Regiment mein tabdel kar dia gaya phir inhein makran kay sahil par waqay bandargah sonmiani mein tarbiat di gaye
App ki amli siasat ka agaz jamia Karachi ( Karachi University) say batour talib ilm hua
Altaf Hussain nay Mahajir tulba ko monazzam kar kay 11 June 1978 ko APMSO All Pakistan Mahajir Student Organization ki bunyad rakhi aur iss kay bani chair man banay

Rahai kay baad app nay mahajir tulba tanzeemo ko puray Karachi mein motariq-o- monazam kar nay ka faisala kiya aur apnay iss faisla ko amli jama pehnanay kay leyeh Altaf Hussain  nay rufqaiy kar kay sath mil kar gair mamuli mahnat say 20 -20 rupay chanda lay kar tanzeem kay tarufi ketabche shuru keye
Yon ye tanzeem baad mein bani lakin iss ko shorat pahalay mili
18 March 1984 ko MQM yani Mahajir Qaumi Movement  kay qayam ka ailan hua
Karachi kay fasadat kay dauran hi Altaf Hussain nay Sindh kay dusray shahron kay , jahan mahajir bakasrat abad thay wasi dauray kiye  aur MQM kay leye akhlaqi hamaiat hasil ki
Iss ka natijah ye hua kay Karachi samait Sindh kay tamam Sehron mein MQM Hindustan say anay walay Mahajren ki sab say bari siasi jamat ban gai
youn iss daur say aj  tak honay walay tamam intakhabat mein Karachi samait Sindh kay dusray ilaqon mein mahajir abadi walay ilaqon mein MQM hi kay umedwar kamyab hotay hain
Altaf Hussain nay baqi sathiyon kay mashwaray say 26 July 1997 ko MQM ka naam Mahajir Qaumi Movement say tabdil kar kay Muttahidah Qaumi Movement rakha gaya
Janab Altaf Hussain nay apni siasi basirat Pakistani siasi mumlat par qabo hasil karlia hai
2002 kay intakhabat kay baad Altaf Hussain ki party Muslim league (Q) kay sath itahad keya aur hukumat mein shamil hui
youn unkay bohot say jila watan rahnuma wapis ayae Sindh kay Governor ka uhda bhi unki party MQM ko mila
Parvez Musharraf kay hamayaton mein iss jamat ka shumar hota raha aur aaj tak Altaf Hussain aur unki jamat Parvez Musharraf kay leye narm gosha rakhtay hain
2008 kay intakhabat (Election) mein apni dairina mokhalif Pakistan Peoples Party kay sath unka itahad hua
Janab Altaf Hussain Pakistani siasat ki aik mottanaza shakhsiyat hain
Jin kay chahnay waly aur mokhalfeen donon ki tadad lakhon mein hain
Muttehida Qaumi Movement kay quaid Altaf Hussain bohot si khubiyon kay malik honay kay sath sath kuch halqoon mein muttanaza siasi shakhsiyat kay taur par bhi pehchanay jatay hain
Lakin ye aik haqiqat hai kay Pakistani balkay Islami Mulkon ki siasat mein jo naam aur muqaam Benazir Bhutu nay Hasil kia, woh kisi aur khatoon kay hisay mein nahi aya
Benazir Bhutto woh wahid khatoon hain jinhoon nay jadeed tarekh mein bazariya intakhabaat kisi Islami Mulk ki sarbarh-e-mumlikat honay ka azaaz hasil kia
Benazir Bhutto, Pakistan kay pehli muntakhab Wazeer-e-Azam Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto ki sab say bari bati thien,  21 June 1953 ko karachi mein paida hoye
Ibtadaye taleem inhoon nay Lady Jennings Nursery School aur Karachi kay Jesus and Mary Convent mein hasil ki
10 saal ki umar mein Mari kay Jesus and Mary Convent mein bheg dia gaya aur iss kay char saal baad America ki Harvard University mein
1973 mein Harvard University say graduation karnay kay baad inhoon nay Oxford University mein dakhla lia wahaan say philosophy, Economics, Politics mein graduation ki
Apni Post graduate studies mukammal karnay kay baad 1977 mein watan wapas laut ayein
Iss kay aik saal kay baad Martial law hatalia janay par Benazir Bhutto mustaqil tore par Pakistan agayein

10 April 1986 ko inki wapsi per Lahore Airport par lakhon logo nay unka isstaqbal kiya wapsi kay baad unhoon nay poray Pakistan mein raliyaan munaqid ki aur Pakistan People‚Äôs Party ko aik baar phir zinda kardia
2 December 1988 ko Benazir Bhutto Pakistan ki pehli khatoon Wazeer-e-Azam ka halaf uthaya

Unhon nay apnay pehlay dora-e-hukumat mein 1989 mein Islamabad mein munaqid honay wali shark sarbarah conference ki sadarat ki, PLO kay numainday ko safeer ka derja dia, America aur Britannia kay doray kia

1 November 1989 ko Benazir kay khelaf assembly mein tehreeq-e- adam atemad pesh ki gaye jo nakaam rahi lakin 6, August 1990 ko Sadar-e-Pakistan Ghulam Ishaq Khan nay 8 wein tarmeem kay tehat apnay ikhtayarat istamal mein latay howay assemblyan tordein aur Benazir Bhutto ko uhdah Wazarat-e-Uzma say mazol kardia
Benazir nay Parliament mein Opposition leader ka uhda sambhala
October 1993 mein honay walay intaykhabat mein Benazir bhutto ki party nay aik dafa phir aksaryat hasil kar li aur Benazir bhutto dusri martaba Pakistan ki Wazir-e-Azam kay tour per samnay aiyeine
Shaheed Benazir Bhutto kay pahlay dour-e- hukumat ki tarah un ka dosra daur-e-hukumat bhi saisi adam itmenan aur tanazat say bhar pur tha
Iss daur ki sab say aham paish raft iss waqt hui
Yeh khabar suntay hi Benazir Dubai say wapis watan lout ayein
Us waqt tak mulk mein nigran hukumat ban chki thie aur mukhtalif parteyan intakhabat mein hissah lanay kay mamlay mein bati huye nazar arahi thein
Shaheed Benazir Bhutto kay saisi carrier mein kamyabiyan aur na kamiyan khch iss tarah apas mein guthi huein hain kay unhain yeksar kamyab ya nakam qarar dayna taqreban na mumkin hai

Yeh albath aik haqiqat hai kay Pakistani saiasat mein un jaysi khatoon saiasatdan aj tak nahin aiyein aur na shayed ayinda aa sakay unkay walid ki tarah unki shakhsiyat bhi shahadat kay baad bhi Pakistan ki siasat o tareekh ko motasir kar rahi hai aur anay walay waqt mein bhi karti rahay gi
Mian Nawaz Sharif 25 December 1949 lahore mein paid hoye
App nay ibtadai taleem Saint Anthony High School Lahore say hasil kiya aur Government Colleague Lahore say graduation kiya
Iss kay alawa app nay Punjab University say LLB ki Degree bhi hasil ki
Taleem say farig honay kay baad khandan kay degar naujawano ki tara app bhi khandani karobar say munsaliq ho gaye aur mutadid company kay managing director aur director rahay
Iss dauran apnay walid Main Mohammad Sharif kay zeer-e-saya ‚ÄúItafaq Islamic Academy‚Äù kay naam say talemi adara qaim kiya iss kay sath sath is kay sarbarah Dr Tahir ul Qadri ko muqarrar kiya
Iss kay alawa app nay amali saisat mein bhi hissa liya

31 May 1988 ko General Zaiaul Haque ki taraf say subai assembly ki barkhs tagi kay bad Mian Nawaz Sharif ko Punjab ka nigran Wazir aala namzad keya geya Janab Nawaz Sharif 1988 kay intaykahbat mein dobarah wazeer-e-Alla muntakhib huye unki iss muddat mein Mari aur Kahota mein zabardast taraqi hui

24 October 1990 ko honay walay intakhabat say qabal Awami National party, Pakistan Muslim league, Jamiat Ulema Islam aur sabiq COP mein intaykhabi mohayda tay paya aur un jamaton nay milkar IJI kay baynar talay intakhabat mein hissa leya
Nawaz Sharif kay dour mein niji shobay kay tawun say mulki sanat ko mazbot bananay ki koshish ki gayein
Mulk ki nigran wazarat-e-Uzma pahlay Balakh sher Mazari aur phir Moin Qureshi ko mili aik bar phir intakhabat huye
Iss martabah People party ko kamyabi hasil hui
Benazir bhutto palimaney leader aur nai Wazir-e-Azam bani

Benazir bhutto ki shahadat kay bad honay walay 18 February 2008 kay intaykahbat mein Nawaz Sharif ki Muslim league nay bhar pur hissah leya aur Pakistan People party kay bad dusri jamat banker samnay aye

Question: Aap ka fashion statement kia hai?Shahrukh Khan: Safed T shirt, blue jeans aur snickers
Beharhal mera mizaj kuch esa hai ke chust kapre mujhe pasand nahi, kapron ke mamle mein meri soch bikul riwayati hai
Question: Aap ka pasandidah fashion icon?Shahrukh Khan: Rock Spring Field aur Brose Springsteen, kyun ke wo donon hi safeed T shirt aur blue jeans pehante hain

Question: Aik celebrity star ke leye fashion trend follow karna kitna zarori hai?Shahrukh Khan: Main bas fashion trend samajhne ki koshish karta hun, mera stylist Den aur Naresh jo pichle kai saalon se mere sath kaam kar rahe hain hameshah infaradiyat ko mad e nazar rakhte hain, magar jab main logon k dekhta hunk e wo had se ziyadah saje sawre hain to mujhe acha nahi lagta
Shayad is ki wajah ye ho ke mujhe mard hazraat ke libas mein sadgi pasand hai ya phir shayad main old fashion hun kyun ke mujhe acha nahi lagta jab larke dhoti shawalr ke sath jacket pehan len
Main apni film ya show ke leye to ese kapre pehan sakta hun lekin is ke elawa kabhi nahi
Mere khayal mein Delip Sahab ka dressing style zabardast tha aur MrBachan bhi kafi stylish hain magar in ke elawa aur koi bhi nahi jis ke fashion senses se mutasir hun

Question: Aap kharidari ke shoqeen hain?Shahrukh Khan: Main sirf London mein shopping karta hun kyun ke wahan shopping kara aasan hai, wahan 2, 3 brend outlet mere pasandidah hain aur unhein mere size ke bare mein aagahi hai
Main garmiyon ke mosam mein shopping ke leye jata hun

Question: Fashion ke mamle mein tanqid ka samna karna pare to?Shahrukh Khan: Esa kabhi nahi hota, han main aksar akhbar parhta rehta hunk e falan star ne is T shirt ke sath coat kyun pehnna? Aur koi jote aur dresses dobarah pehan leye wagherah wagherah
Agar main chahon to saal ke 300 din 300 alag alag jote pehan sakta hun magar main esa nahi karta
Agar mujhe koi jeans ka shoe acha lagta hai to main ussi ke 2, 3 sets kharid leta hun, mujhe yehi pasand hai

Question: Aap ki wardrobe ki sab se sasti tareen cheiz kia hai?Shahrukh Khan: Mujhe jo pasand aaye wo kharid leta hun, magar mere wordrobe mein bohat si esi T shirts hain jo shayad dosre adakaron ke kapron se ziyadah sasti hon

Main qemat ke bare mein sawal nahi karta magar ye aksar pochta hunk e kahein ye dolne ke bad sukar to nahi jaye ga? Jis par log herani se hanste bhi hain, shayad ab wo zamana nahi raha jab kapre 1 bar dhulne ke bad sukar jaya karte the

Hollywood nagri mein jin adakaron ne ghair mamoli shohrat hasil ki, un mein aik naam Angelina Jolie ka bhi hai
Tekhe naqosh bari chamakdar aankhon aur surahidar gardan wali Angelina Jolie 4 June 1975 ko Los Angeles mein adakar John Voight ke ghar piada hoi
Un ki maa bhi adakara thein
Bachpan mein Angelina pabandi se apni maa ke sath films dekhne jati thein
Jab wo 6 baras ki hoi to apni maa aur sotele bap ke sath New York aagayen
Lekin 5 baras bad Angelina ne dobarah Los Angeles ka rukh kiya
Is bar Angelina  ne adakari ke medan mein qadam rakhne ka fasla kiya
Angelina ne baqaidah adakari sekhne ke leye aik institue mein dakhla le liya jahan wo do sal tak adakari ki tarbiyat lene ke sath mukhtalif stage dramon mein bhi hissa leti rahein
14 baras ki umar tak pohanchne ke bad Angelina adakari ki tarbiyat adhori chor kar murdon ki akhri rasomaat ada karne ke kaam (funeral direction) mein dilchaspi lene lagen
Isi doran Angelina ne modling ki duniya mein qadam rakh diya
Us dor mein wo ziyadah tar siyah libas hi mein malbos nazar aati thein
Isi dorran aik larke se un ki dosti hoi jo 2 saal tak chali
Is ke bad Jolie Beverly Hills High School se taleem mukamal karne ke bad dobara adakari ki tarbiyat ki tataf mutawaja ho gayein
Screen par un ke career ka aghaz 1982 mein film "lookin to get out" mein apne walid John Voight ke sath mukhtasir kirdar ke sath howa
Is ke bad wo apne bhai ke school ke "television cinema" ke leye banai gai 5 filmon mein kaam karne ke sath sath chand gaon ki videoes meim bhi nazar ayen
Adakari mein Angelina ne apne walid se bohat kuch sekha hai
Adakari  mein  Angelina Jolie ke career ka baqaidah aghaz 1993 mein kaam bagudet ki science faction video film "Cyborg 2" se howa
1999 mein film "Girl interupted" mein behtareen performance par unhein Acadmy Awarad se nawaza gaya
Inhein kaamon par unhein kai azazat se bhi nawaza gaya
Jab ke filmi career mein unhein aik Academy, 2  Screen  Guild aur 3 Golden Globe award hasil kiye
2009 mein Forbes nami jaride ne unhein sab se ziyadah mawza lene wali adakara qarar diya
Unhein kai jaridon mein purkashish aur khubsorat tareen khawateen mein sarefehrist rakha

Azeem Pakistani qawwal  mauseeqar aur Singer Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan 13 October 1948 ke roz Faisalabad mein peyda hue
Ap ke walid Fateh Ali Khan aur Chacha Mubarak Ali Khan apne waqt ke mashoor qawwal the
In ke khandan ne qiyam Pakistan ke waqt Mashraqi Punjab ke zila Jhalandar se hijrat kar ke Faislabad mein sakonat ikhteyar kit hi
In ki mashoor qawali   Ali Maula Ali   inhe dinon ki yadgaar hai
In ki qawwali   Dam Mast Qalandar Mast Mast   release hui
Is mashoor qawwali ke manzar-e-aam mein aane se pehle wo America mein Brooklyn Academy of Music ke Next View Festival mein apne fun ke johar dikha chuke the
Lekin   Dam Mast Qalandar Mast Mast   ki release ke bad unhe University of Washington mein mauseeqi ki tadrees ki dawat di gai
Maghrib ke ilawa Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ne Bharat mein bhi kae filmon ki mauseeqi di
Kae filmon mein un ke gane istemaal kiye gae aur aaj tak kiye ja rahe hain
Genius Book of World Records ke mutabiq duniya bhar mein qawwali ke sab se ziyada album Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ne ( 125 ) release kiye gae
Yeh wo waqt tha ke Pakistan mein ziyada log in ke naam se aashna nahi the
Tahum 90 ki dehai mein aik qawwali   Dam Mast Qalandar   pore Pakistan mein in ki pehchan ban gai
Us waqt tak maghrib ke mauseeqar Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ke kaam se aashna ho chuke the aur in mein kae bohat mutassir the
Jis ke bad maghrib mein bhi wo kisi tarruf ke mohtaj nahi rahe  lekin maghrib mein mauseeqaron ne qawali mein jiddat mutarif karwane ke liye nae saaz shamil kiye

Foot ki almi tanzem FIFA ne  foot baal ke almi cup ke muqablon ke leye ‚Äúrotation‚Äù ki policy ke tehat ye fasla kiya tha

Is policy ka elan karte howae FIFA ke saddar ‚ÄúSep Bilatar‚Äù 7th March 2013 ko elan kiya tha ke World Cup ke leye Football ki tamam alimi tanzemon ko masawi tor par muqablon ke ineqad ka muqa dene ki policy apnai gai hai, jis ke tehat 2014 ka Football World Cup Jonubi America ki Football fedaration se taluq rakhne wale kisi bhi mulk mein munaqid kiya jaye ga

Is elan ke bad khud bakhud Jonubi America ke bahar sargaram e amal tamam Football fedrations World Cup ke ineqad ke muqable se bahar ho gayein aur Jonubi America ki Football ki tanzeem ‚ÄúSouth American Football Assosiation‚Äù ke members mumalik ke mabeen tehra
In mumalik mein Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Cheli, Colombia, Ecuador, Paraguay, Uruguay, Peru aur Venezvila shamil hain
tahum 3 June 2013 ko Argentina, Brazil aur Colombia ke elawa tamam mumalik ne muqable ke ineqad ki dor se khud ko alehdah rakhne ka elan kiya
Mutazamin ke mutabiq World Cup ke muqabalon ke leye ibtedai tor par 18 sheharon ka intekhab kiya gaya
Waze rahe ke ye tamam shehar Brazil ke taqreban tamam aham elaqon ya khiton ka ahata karte hain
In sheharon mein Brasilia, Sao Paulo, Salvador, Recife, Cuiaba, Manaus, Natal, Rio de Janeiro, Fortaleza, Belo Horizonte, Porto Alegre aur Curitiba shamil hain
Tahum is andazah lagai gai raqam mein 435 Million Dollor ka ezafah howa jis par zabardast awami rad e amal bhi samne aaya
Dosri taraf Brazil ke wazir e Kheel Aldo Rebelo ka kehna hai ke World Cup ke ineqad se Brazil ki maishat mein lag bhag 90 Billion Dollor dakhil hon ge, jis ka baraherast faidah awam ko hasil ho ga
World Cup ke doran majmoi tor par 12 stadiums mein muqabalon ka ineqad ho ga
Inmein se 7 medan naye tameer kiye gaye hain
Jin mein Brasilia mein waqaye ‚ÄúEatadio Mane Garrincha‚Äù bhi shamil hai
